name: One in a Trillion
summary:
Start your adventure to beat the odds and find the rarest eggs in the world!

One in a Trillion is a relaxing clicker game where you are challenged with finding all of our ultra-rare eggs. From eggs that only appear once every 250 taps to the insane golden egg that has a one in a trillion chance of appearing!

It’s not just a case of tapping away and hoping for the best – some eggs momentarily appear on the screen and you must quickly click on them before they’re gone again.

Every tap comes with a one in a thousand chance of starting an egg hunt. You have ten seconds to quickly hunt down the egg’s location on the screen! These eggs are often found in a dirty condition and require cleaning before you can see how rare it is, but they come with the added bonus of having a rarity rating – providing you with more chances of having a super rare egg.

You may not always find a cute egg but no tap is without it’s reward, you’ll continuously be earning money which you can spend in the shop to speed up egg cleaning or increase it’s chance of being rare.

You can also raise funds by selling eggs that you’ve already found. Work your way towards increasing your money and being able to buy the possibility of even rarer eggs.

Once an egg is clean, watch it’s slow reveal and wait in anticipation to see just how rare your egg is!

One in a Trillion is an idle tapper game that will keep you busy for many hours.

You cannot turn back. The screen will continue to scroll right even while shopping or fighting enemies. You must keep advancing and save the world.In One Way Heroics, if the player moves or attacks enemies will do the same. In essence, it is a rogue-like game. To clear the game, you must defeat the Demon Lord, who will appear after a set time.One round is around 30 minutes play time, and some parts of your legend carry over into the next round. See if you can overcome the challenges of this one way adventure.

name: Oni Zero: Fukkatsu
summary:
Long ago, during the Heian period, there was a village where humans and ghosts coexisted peacefully. Created by a ghost who wanted to end the animosity between them, it existed, isolated, for more than 250 years. One day, however, the village was attacked from the outside and completely destroyed. A young boy living in the village, Shiroumaru, and his friends, Gedoumaru and Saki, managed to escape with their lives. Now, eight years later, they are setting off together on a quest to bring peace to the land.

Oni Zero: Fukkatsu is traditional Japaneses turn-based RPG, and the last title in the series produced by series creators Pandora Box. The game follows the same formula laid out by Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy. Characters carry different elemental alignments, which affects their combat capabilities. As their abilities grow, the characters can learn special transformation attacks, and find many different spirits to aid their quest.

The game also features connectivity with other games in the Pandora Max Series. Extra unlockables are available for those who own other titles in the series.

name: One-Eyed Ripper
summary:
The protagonist, Mebuki Meme, had a peaceful everyday life.
A dear friend, and a dear brother, she held them closely.

However, that mundane peacefulness came to an abrupt end.
Because of the “murder case” which revolving around her.

“The One Eyed Ripper.”
Remembering that name,
Rumors created by someone had created a murderer.
Those peaceful everyday’s have ended.
Now begins the story of a person killing another.

For love, for desire, for the sake of finding the right answer.
Well then, who’s the culprit?

Think straight with a new kind of puzzle that relies on your most basic brain functions - motion & prediction. Beneath the words of Wordle. Below the math of Sudoku.
Start a chain reaction that will clear all the O's from the screen -> ONO (no O's).
Starting with the simplest forms + rules, complexity and variety emerge as elements are added. A fun easy way to work on your clarity, focus and working memory.

summary: This is a short story in a sci-fi setting with a top-down view, telling the story of a nameless man lost in routine in the middle of a cold world and soulless machines. But what if it could be different?

name: One by One
summary: Human phobias have awoken in this dark roguelike shooter One by One! Collect powerful artifacts and descend into random dungeons full of monsters and huge boss fights. Use your soul — an ultimate weapon that uncovers enemy weaknesses.

summary: We are in war, but in this hard times I can find a peaceful place with you. A adult love history with magic and fantasy like always.

summary: You have just received a coded love letter! In this minimalist puzzle, you will have to draw a single line to fill the entire board. At each level solved, get a code to reveal a piece of the letter. Gather the codes, read the letter and discover the message.

name: One Piece Odyssey
summary: One Piece Odyssey is an RPG that puts players in control of Luffy and the other Straw Hat Pirates in an open world. You can travel around an island embarking on quests, exploring dungeons, solving puzzles and battling creatures in turn-based combat. During fights, the crew is divided up between active members and reserve members. All characters receive EXP, regardless of whether they are part of the active party or not.

name: Oni: Road to be the Mightiest Oni
summary:
Break your enemy's heart to reclaim your pride.
Kuuta, a demon, once challenged a man to a battle and was defeated.
At last, he arrives at Kisejima Island. He and his partner Kazemaru, whom he met on the island, overcome their ordeal as one, gaining new strength along the way.
This time, will the duo be able to achieve victory?
Join Kuuta on his adventure to get revenge against Momotaro, a demon masquerading as a man.

name: One of the Victims
summary: From being lost in a forest to end up fighting normal zombies, running from the fast ones, and avoiding traps. Something is abnormal out there.. especially on hard mode! But the question is, will you accept being One Of The Victims?

name: One By One
summary: One By One is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: One Last Memory: Reimagined

name: One Btn Bosses
summary: It's One Button Bosses, it's all in the name. You have one button. There are big bosses to beat. Push, tap, and bash in the handcrafted campaign or in the roguelike rifts.

name: Only Lead Can Stop Them
summary: Boot up your 486 and launch olcst.exe for this retro fps from an alternate 1990's. Descend into the madness of the Spanish Civil War fighting vicious fascist forces and supernatural monsters. Conquer three action packed episodes wielding machine guns, rifles, flamethrowers and explosives.

name: On a Roll 3D: Levels 7 - 9
summary: Three brand new worlds of On A Roll 3D with new music and graphics. Each world has three areas and a boss. Lots of new puzzles and game mechanics with new fastest time leaderboards for each area.

name: One Hell of a Week
summary: A 18+ Yuri romance Visual Novel taking place in a tropical paradise. Oh, and there's Satan.

name: Onc' Picsou
summary: French handheld game based on Uncle Scrooge. It was only released in France in 1984.

name: One Way Trip
summary: Stealth will be your only defense in this 1-4 player Sci-fi horror scenario while you attempt to escape an ever learning AI. Be quite, stay hidden, and remain calm, or face certain death.

name: On the Wings: Birth of a Hero
summary: You are not born as a Hero. But you can become one! Bruce and Ursula are sister and brother living with their mother. One day their life starts to change with a Dragon. Now, it is time to become a Hero by saving their village and their captive father from Dark Rider. Get ready for a nice RPG story.

name: One-Armed Cook
summary: One-armed Cook is a chaotic co-op cooking game for up to 4 people. Work as a team or cook on your own, set your own pace, and don't let the stress of a full restaurant catch up to you. The goofy physics-based aspect of the game gives this cooking game a new twist.

name: One State
summary:
OneState is the world's first RolePlay game with an open world and 500+ people online in one map! Choose your own path in OneState!

There can be more than 500 people in the map! It's a whole new gaming experience when the whole city is populated by real players! Immerse yourself in this life simulator with endless gaming possibilities.

name: One Room VR: Yui Edition
summary: Yui Hanasaka, the most popular character in One Room’s first anime season, comes to your apartment and asks you to tutor her!

name: OneShot: World Machine Edition
summary:
The World Knows You Exist.

Experience an adventure game with puzzles that go beyond its own window and establish a unique bond with the main character.

In OneShot: World Machine Edition, you discover a strange computer operating system with a self-contained world installed. Explore this world to unravel its mysteries and help guide a child on their mission to restore the long-dead sun.

You hear that saving the world may no longer be possible… But it’s worth a shot, you think. Now with collectible content and features exclusive to the World Machine Edition!

name: One Many Nobody
summary: The future of human kind is at stake. The planet's energy resources had run out and the urge to find an alternative source has become the only priority at any cost. Are you willing to accept your fate in this pixel art puzzle-adventure game set in a futuristic distopic world?

name: One Shot
summary: One Shot is a Ultra Dynamic shooter when you try to survive against a waves of enemy and fight a "final boss" at the end of each waves.

name: Onohi
summary: Onohi is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Maka as she explores her dream world.

name: OneBit PacMan
summary: A fan-made recreation of the arcade classic Pac-Man for the Playdate, based on Edgar M. Vigdal's deluxe version for the Commodore Amiga. Features 12 mazes with difficulty options and power-ups.

name: One-Way
summary: One-WAY is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a girl named Alyssa. The goal is to explore her dreams and collect effects.

name: One
summary: In the world of "One" Action Third Person Shooter, fighters with enhanced combat suit get bigger and stronger for every kill they get.

name: On the Q.T.
summary: On the Q.T. is a mobile otome game released in 2018.

name: Once Human
summary: Once Human is a multiplayer open-world survival game set in a strange, post-apocalyptic future. Unite with friends to fight monstrous enemies, uncover secret plots, compete for resources, and build your own territory. Once, you were merely human. Now, you have the power to remake the world.

name: One More Gate : A Wakfu Legend
summary: One More Gate is a rogue-lite deck-builder that combines exploration and turn-based strategic combat. Head out to discover fantastic places, master the power of Wakfu to create destructive card combos, and defeat all those who would stand in your way!

name: Ongeki Bright

name: Once Again

name: One Step Away

name: One Line: Connect the Dots
summary: An addictive brain teaser with simple yet challenging levels. Try if you can connect all the dots with one touch. Your puzzle skills will be tested at each level. Connect all the dots and Win!

name: Online @ The Perfect Time
summary: With your exams coming up faster than you imagined, you needed to let off some steam and whilst waiting for take-out you stumbled on what seemed to be a new show. Soon enough you were diving head first into a new fandom. Will your heart be steady enough to embrace these new relationships or will the stress of it all cause you to make choices you wished to forget?

name: OneBit Berzerk

name: One True Hero

Are these dangers of the outer world or of your own soul?

name: OneBit Frogger

Once Upon a Thai is an adventure game where the Thai language is magical, and knowing its words grants you power over the environment.

You have to decypher Spells, travel through the map of real Thailand in order to make friends, collect words, and restore balance to the world of Spirit.

No former knowledge is required: you will learn Thai as you progress into the game.

name: On the Peril of Parrots
summary: Explore the line between machine and personhood, in this Puzzle Narrative experience. Take on the role of an AI, created by the world renowned, Dr. G. Step through a battery of cognition tests and prove your intelligence, sentience and ultimately your humanity.

A storm, a shipwreck, a mysterious island. Expect the unexpected on your next adventure with the Straw Hats! A new RPG from the hugely popular manga and anime series One Piece, commemorating the 25th anniversary of the series!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: One Piece Odyssey
- Luffy & Lim Figurine 230 x 210 x 210 mm
- Steelcase
- 3 Postcards
- Collector's Box
- Deluxe Pack - 2 Petite Jewelries + Travelling Outpit Sniper King + 100,000

Is a ps1-style horror game set in a small, quiet town.

You are a resident, who works in the city market, and who has to go through dark and scary paths to get to your shift.

But on that day you find something strange, a mark in the back of the supermarket.

Who knows what it might mean?

name: One Last Try

summary: Explore an online co-op open-world horror void of hope and shadowed by darkness where you and your feline companion will investigate a post-apocalyptic world searching for evidence so that you might piece together the story that started it all and hopefully find a way to end it.

name: Onna Katei Kyoushi Jitka-sensei to Misshitsu ni Itara Maru-maru Shichau Kamoshirenai
OneShot: The Tarion Machine
summary:
Welcome to the Tarion Machine.

After the events of Solstice, The World Machine discovers a remote disruption targeting itself at them. Investigating the cause, they come across a new world led by an oddly upbeat World Machine...

name: One Beat Min
summary:
One Beat Min is a game in development about music, rhythm, and beatbox battles where players select characters and press buttons on the joystick to create their beat and try to run the opponent.

The game brings the universe of Hip Hop, urban culture, creative freedom, and diversity into a charismatic design.

name: OnlyFap Simulator 3

name: OnlySociety: Dawn
summary: Explore the untaken road, survive your way through. Shoot your way to unravel the mysterious scattered world. This is just the beginning.

name: One Piece Unlimited World Red: Chopper Edition
summary:
One Piece: Unlimited World Red is an Action/Adventure video game based on the famous One Piece manga and anime.

This is the thirty-sixth video game based on the series, and the fifth title in the Unlimited sub-series. It was released for the Nintendo 3DS in Japan on November 21, 2013 and released for additional platforms and in more regions the following year.

name: OneBit Arena
summary: Classic arcade gameplay for your PlayDate console

name: Once Upon a Time on Halloween
summary: In 1920, a pact was made between humans and pumpkins. People were supposed to take care of the pumpkins throughout the year. Pumpkins were to protect people from evil once a year. In one day, the pumpkins must stop the monsters of the whole world from passing into tomorrow. If they fail to do so, the world will be overrun by evil for 364 days. This day was called Halloween.

name: One Million Miles
summary:
Take to the stars in this tranquil endless runner - and explore an infinite universe, run after run.
Travel a million miles and more by accelerating off planetary orbits, avoiding asteroids and meteors and charging your ship’s shield and hyperdrive with mysterious orbs.
Explore the vast beauty of the cosmos and get up close with stars, black holes and distant civilisations.

name: One Tank Army
summary: One Tank Army is a game in which your goal is to defeat everyone from inside of the tank, changing places at the same time. Use the main gun as well as additional machine guns to clear the battlefield from enemies.

name: Once Upon A Siege

name: OnlyFap Simulator 4
summary: OnlyFap Simulator 4 is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to start making streams.

name: OnlyFap: Fitness Baby
summary: OnlyFap: Fitness Baby is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to start making streams.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors - Collector's Edition
summary:
Pirate Warriors is an action game incorporating elements from both the Dynasty Warriors series and the One Piece series. The game's story mode, Main Log, allows the player to play through the storyline. The Adventure mode uses Luffy to play through the events of the One Piece series and the battle mode allows the player to use characters in battles. In Another Log, the player can play through a character's storyline. With it are several stories exclusive to the game.

In addition to the game itself, the collector's edition will exclusively offer the "Thousand Sunny", the ship on which Luffy's crew sails the seas towards a horizon of adventures.

name: On the Road
summary:
After the quite successful "Wall Street Wizard", the young German software house Lifetimes has now tried its hand again at a business simulation. As with Starbyte's "Transworld", it's all about the mysterious world of the freight forwarding business.
Instead of finding one's way in the hectic hustle and bustle of the stock exchange, this time one is supposed to direct the captains of the road. Up to six players (the Amiga replaces the missing one) can take part in the attempt to dominate the transport market in Europe.

name: OneShot
summary: In this Puzzle/Adventure game you must guide Niko through a mysterious world, utilizing items, characters, and the environment to progress. The life of a lost child and the fate of a steadily decaying world hang in balance, and not everyone—or everything—is interested in preserving them either.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2 - Collector's Editon
summary:
One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2 is the breathtaking sequel of One Piece: Pirate Warriors, a big action/adventure game in which you will take down hordes of Pirates in the beloved world of One Piece. Immerse yourself by playing the “New World”, with your favorite’s characters and their latest techniques and costumes!

The collector's version contains a Luffy figurine made by the renowned Japanese sculptor Keiji Iwakura

name: One Direction Heardle
summary: A clone of Heardle, but for One Direction (group) songs. Each 1D Heardle is a randomly chosen song.

name: One For Two
summary: One For Two is a very fast platform game, where the subtlety is that you control two characters at the same time. You must drive both blobs to the end of each level but be careful, if only one fails then you will lose.

name: Once in a Blue Moon
summary: Welcome to Once in a Blue Moon (OIABM), a beautifully hand-crafted experience that is literally out of this world. Set in a cosmic galaxy, you will have the chance to take a walk through an immersive forest with shafts of glorious light generated by the large Blue Moon in orbit.

name: Oneiro
summary: As the first Oracle of Delphi, it is your duty to help people by telling them your visions and predictions. Collect effects but don't let the dream world affect you too much. An entry for Dream Diary Jam 2

name: One Man's War
summary: It is a single player 3D horizontal shooting adventure game. Through constant upgrading, it strengthens its talent, defeats many powerful enemies, ends the war, and ushers in peace for the world again!

name: Once upon a Dungeon II
summary: Explore an open world, descend into dark dungeons, defeat challenging creatures and collect unique loot in this hardcore roguelike game.

name: One Last Time
summary: Life can change in an instant, sometimes in the wrong way. After losing someone close, a mysteriously familiar person shows up to help you get your life back together. Overcome the stages of grief in this intriguing puzzle-centric, dialogue experience and see how the story unfolds.

name: One Wheel Guy
summary: One Wheel Guy is a fun and challenging platforming game where you control a guy on a unicycle and try to guide him to the goal at the end of each level.

name: On Border
summary: On Border is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore Jaretsuki's dream world and collect effects.

name: Onasu
summary:
Onasu is a Yume Nikki fangame. It is based on the console game in Yume Nikki, Nasu.

Your goal is to catch the falling eggplants before they destroy all of the floor tiles beneath you and achieve the highest score possible.

name: On Leaving the Building

name: Online-Go.com
summary:
Online-Go.com is the best place to play the game of Go online. Our community supported site is friendly, easy to use, and free, so come join us and play some Go!

Online-go.com is made possible by the generous financial support from hundreds of individual site supporters, the guidance and welcome friendly attitudes of the Go community at large, and by a large collection of volunteers that have helped translate Online-Go.com into a multitude of different languages from all over the world.

name: Only A Dream
summary: You go to sleep one night, only to wake up in an unfamiliar cave-like place! Try to escape the strange cave and get back to "reality" in this horror/puzzle adventure game, but beware, for you... are... not... alone....

name: Onion Assault

name: One Piece Odyssey: Deluxe Edition

A brand new RPG set in the world of the popular anime, ONE PIECE! Play as members of the Straw Hat Crew in a fantastic adventure set in the ONE PIECE world!

The Deluxe Edition includes the Main Game, the Adventure Expansion Pack and the Deluxe Edition Bonus: Sniper King Outfit Set.

name: Ones!
summary:
A very simple rule, but once you start the game, it's hard to stop.
You will be addicted to play this game before you know it.

name: One Hit Cowboy
summary:
One Hit Cowboy is featured as “New game we love” and "Best new updates" "in more than 120 countries(regions) ! Including US, Canada, UK, France, China, HK, Taiwan etc..
One Hit Cowboy is a very addictive and challenging arcade game.
You're a lone cowboy, armed with your trusty revolver. You only have one bullet for dealing with each bandit.
Time your shots, pull the trigger fast and precise. Miss one? You're dead as a door nail.
Are you ready to face-off with all kinds of gunslingin' bandits? Let's see if you're the fastest gun in the West!

name: One More Run: Endless Cricket Runner
summary:
One More Run is the perfect blend of cricket and endless arcade games. You'll have a tough time finding a more fun cricket game!
T20 is fast and furious. One More Run trumps the breakneck pace of T20 cricket by always putting you in the last over. Hang on to that last wicket and keep going for One More Run! - an endless cricket runner that will have you coming back for more. How much can you run? How far can you go? How many matches can you win?

name: On the Wind
summary:
Take control of the wind and guide the leaves through a beautiful and stylish world. Try to survive through the year as the seasons change and the leaves fall.
You are the wind, guide the leaves, flourish in the summer, survive the winter.

name: One Block: Puzzle Adventure
summary:
Do you like puzzles games or brain teasers? You are in a right place!
 One Block is a logic game which focuses on thinking and solving skills. Each puzzle makes you think few steps ahead and gets more and more challenging as you progress.
Hand crafted levels filled with various innovative mechanics are ready to be solved. The goal is simple: merge blocks of the same color and collect stars simultaneously. By the way, you have to stay in the board frame! The logic puzzle starts simple but further in the game you will encounter new elements. Take advantage of each game element and use their powers to stay on the board in order to complete a level.

name: Onamae nan dakke? Otona mo Kodomo mo Kantan Tanoshii Namae Ate Quiz Game
Online Open World RPG
summary:
A game in the "Open World RPG" series!
This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Only Furry 18+
summary: Only Furry 18+ is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to make a post. After every reached goal you will get a beautiful 3D picture or awesome 3D animation with girl.

name: One Ton Reloaded
summary: The game play has changed, but One Ton is still as tough as ever. Shoot, bash, and smash your way through hordes of humanoid robots.

name: One Night at Flumpty's: The Egg Collection
summary: One Night at Flumpty's: The Egg Collection is a console bundle featuring the three main titles from the One Night at Flumpty's series.

name: One Ton Bang Bang
summary: One Ton was a science experiment, but now he wants to escape. Help One Ton escape from the underground base. Blast your way to freedom. Some rooms may take a little thought to escape. TIP: blast everything!

name: One Shot Challenge
summary: One Shot Challenge is a casual game that tests your accuracy. Your mission is to kill all the zombies that stand in your way, but there It's just a small problem, you have just a few bullets to shoot them all.

name: Ongaku Tsukuuru: Kanadeeru - Senyou Score Data
Only One Night
summary:
Keep the fire burning and help your injured friend survive the night!

Search the area for firewood, but be careful not to freeze to death or be surprised by wild animals!

name: One Night At Barneys 3
summary: A survival horror game based off of Five Nights at Freddy's featuring many iconic characters from Barney & Friends. Defend, upgrade, and discover secrets throughout the one night you will spend trapped in a prison.

name: One Tap Golf VR
summary: ONE TAP GOLF VR brings a fresh new experience to your headset with sixty levels divided into stages of three for you to enjoy ! Every stage you play , you will have three hearts to survive three levels. If you miss three times, you go back to the beginning of the stage !

name: Oniami
summary: A journey across vast lands.

name: OnlyFap Simulator 6
summary: OnlyFap Simulator 6 is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media. You should help main character to earn enough money to start making streams. After every reached goal you gonna be surprised with amazing video with female protagonist.

name: One-Armed Cook: Drinks and Bars
summary: Upgrade your kitchen with One-armed cook's drinks and bars DLC. Mix and serve delicious drinks, navigate chaotic physics-based gameplay, and impress your customers with your mixology skills.

name: One Drone
summary: One Drone - A game with a side view, the player controls the drone, dodging enemy projectiles, objects and flying machines, along the way collecting bonus electronic chips that open up new opportunities for the drone and further progress!

name: One Armed Bandit
summary: Spin to win in this colorful casino-themed, slot-machine-building roguelike!

name: One Tap Rally
summary:
Take on the worlds best! One touch control multiplayer rally car racing game
Slide and drift around corners with One Tap Rally, a fun and simple yet hard to master, top down, old school rally car racing game. If you like slot cars games, then this is the game for you.

name: One Deck Dungeon: Forest of Shadows & Abyssal Depths
One Piece Odyssey: Traveling Outfit Set
summary: Includes Energy Apple x 10, Excite Apple x 10, Golden Jelly x 3, 100,000 Berries, and Traveling Outfit Set for Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, Usopp, Nami, Chopper, and Robin.

name: Once a Tale
summary: You are invited to step into the enchanting world of fairy tales like never before. Play as Hansel and Gretel in this unique stop-motion-style single-player 3rd-person narrative adventure where you'll uncover mysteries, solve puzzles, and meet a reimagined cast of beloved fairytale characters.

name: Once Upon a Tower
summary: Have you ever tried to escape somewhere? Ever feel like you're in a tower? Ever see yourself waiting for a brave knight to rescue you? No more waiting! Because he's not coming, baby... No, really, he's not coming. He was literally devoured by that dragon over there. But fear not, you have everything you need to break free. The brave knight left the warhammer behind. You can use it, can't you? You can wipe out enemies. You can run away from the dragon. This time the adventure starts in a tower.

name: Onenellemoo
summary: This is an action-adventure game that requires you to use your brain. Save the world with your powers of observation and inspiration!

name: One True Waifu
summary: Match and destroy pairs of heathen waifus until you find her — The one! Nothing will stop you from reconnecting with your true waifu.

name: One Thousand Pinball Dots
summary: Hi there! Do you like Pinball? What about Brick Breaker? Well, we have mixed these two classic games together so prepare for an endless fun!

name: One Piece Card Game Tutorial
summary:
One Piece Card Game is a collectible card game themed on the world of One Piece!
Characters from all over the history of One Piece, including the anime, manga, and movies, are featured in the game, and there are even cards inspired by famous scenes from all of them!

name: One Button Bob
summary: Help One Button Bob traverse a dangerous castle and find a treasure via the simple click of a mouse button. You click anywhere in the game to make Bob perform various actions—like jumping over pits or running away from heavy boulders Indiana Jones style.

name: One Step Back
summary: Explore the mind of a man stuck with his memories- only by forgetting the past can he advance.

name: One Line 3D
summary: A simple, but challenging puzzle for your brain! Fill in all of the blocks in one line. Drag or tap on the blocks to fill them.

name: One Soul
summary: Explore dark dungeons. Wield your sword to attack enemies. Raise your shield to block attacks. Find keys to unlock doors. What will you discover?

name: On the Job
summary: Sneak your way past guards and obstacles through as many levels as you can in this turn-based roguelite stealth game, getting top secret documents and super cool gadgets on the way!

name: One More Try
summary: Take control of any character and don't worry about his death - there are still many people in the world. Mages, knights, archers - choose anyone you want. Use your victims as a weapon in the fight against those who block your way home.

name: Once Alive
summary: A story-driven, first person adventure game with a cinematic experience. Set off for a journey to HaustVille, an abandoned settlement in a post-apocalyptic world. Explore your surroundings and unveil the mystery of how the last survivors vanished.

name: One Card One Shot: Mafia
summary: Enter the world of the mafia, with an agile and dynamic Card Game that will challenge you in your free moments or addict you for hours! Choose a mission and hit the target in seconds! What awaits you with each card turned over? Will you become the legend feared by all or will you fall into oblivion?

name: One Way Home
summary: Take on the role of a twelve-year-old boy in this puzzle platformer about the journey home through the most terrifying of nightmares. Each playthrough is unique: the choices you make affect the types of skills and locations, the development of the story and its ending.

name: On Point
summary: Experience classic 90’s arcade vibes with On Point, a fully immersive light-gun shooter for VR. You'll have to think fast and shoot faster as you blast your way through over 30 wacky minigames designed for all ages and skill levels.

name: One Step to Paradise
summary: You are about to dive into the adventures of the main hero: pilot-engineer Henry Morgan! The adventure is truly dangerous, but at the same time very passionate and full of love! An intriguing plot with unexpected twists that will leave you craving for more!

name: Onchu
summary: Assume the role of Onchu, a druid boy stranded on an island corrupted by dark magic. Learn new magic and abilities in this 2D Metroidvania and explore a stunning sidescrolling world to save the island from destruction.

name: OneWay.exe
summary:
oneway.exe is a first-person, single player horror game, with a heavy focus on story and internet culture. Explore, survive and solve puzzles to find out what happened to UNTITLED.EXE, its developers, and understand why you're in the middle of it.

Face the internet horrors that haunt your past. The one's you've never heard of. They don't exist.

name: One week, My room
summary: A week in just five minutes. A closed off room, just eight tatami in size. A small world for you to save. This game is a puzzle adventure that takes from thirty minutes to an hour to play through.

name: Onsen mo Issho
summary: The follow-up to "Typing with Toro," a typing tutor game based on the Japanese PlayStation game Doko Demo Issyo. This time Toro and his friends are heading to a hot springs resort and will require your conversational typing prowess along the way. New minigames include karaoke, word games, snowman building, and others.

name: On N Off
summary: A clone of Lights Out!.

name: One Day of Mr. Potato
summary: A platforming game where the player must collect keys to free the imprisoned "potato". The player cannot jump, only climb ladders. The main characters strongly resemble Kirby, but they are actually modified versions of Tiki from The NewZealand Story. Later hacked to create Defender (VT09).

name: One Wheel
summary:
Take a ride on the great bridge in the sky!
Immerse yourself in the beautiful world above the clouds!
The bridge holds various surprises that will test your unicycle riding skills.
Choose your rider from a multitude of characters, from girls and boys to witches and zombies.

name: One
summary: Boris Osterheld is dead. Venture into a world full of mystery and deceit. As you embark on an apparent search for answers, an erratic murderer and a colorful cast of characters only help to raise more questions. As you gather clues and get closer to the truth you will begin to question reality and even yourself.

name: One-armed Cook: Ships and Oceans
summary: Are you prepared to set sail on a culinary adventure? Get ready to cook on the open sea, with mouth-watering new meals for the guests.

name: On the Wind's Breath
summary: In On the Wind's Breath, play as a dandelion seed, navigate obstacles, find fertile soil, take control of the wind, grow into a flower. Simple graphics, intuitive controls, meditative experience. Beware of unsuitable surfaces. Soothing soundtrack, a journey through various regions.

name: On the Other Side
summary: Take on the role of a modern exorcist in this realistic ghost hunting horror. You have to fulfill contracts related to paranormal phenomena. Your main weapon is an old camera that can shoot what is not visible to the human eye.

name: Only Up!
summary: Embark on an exciting journey in Only UP! Exploring a huge world full of secrets and mysteries, you have to get as high as possible, and the most interesting starts above the clouds...

name: OnlySociety Midgard Imperial
summary: Recruit hero's and defeat the opponents in Medieval environment. Equip different weapons and perform combo to turn down your enemies. The platform is huge enough and avoid jumping down the cliff.

name: On the Fly!
summary: On the Fly! is a cozy couch co-op party game where two players take on the roles of stage crew and attempt to ensure their production goes off without a hitch.

name: On the Brink
summary: Manipulate the gravity of galaxies to traverse the universe, solve puzzles, reignite constellations, and uncover the mysteries of Project: Almagest to find your way home.

name: One-Thousand Cuts
summary: One-Thousand Cuts is a samurai action side-scroller with cinematic action and instant-death combat. Hack and slash your way through the infamous Army of One-Thousand and reclaim your rightful place as daimyo.

name: One-Eyed Likho
summary:
One-Eyed Likho is a grim first-person horror adventure set in a world inspired by a dark, Slavic fairy tale “The One-eyed Likho”. Likho, is an embodiment of evil fate and misfortune in Slavic mythology, a creature with one eye, often depicted as an old, skinny woman in black.

Embark on an exhilarating journey through a haunting realm brought to life from a forgotten Slavic fairy tale of the 19th century. Immerse yourself in a captivating world rendered in mesmerizing greyscale, presented in an immersive 4:3 aspect ratio that adds depth to your adventure.

name: One.
summary: One. is a remake of the 1999 visual novel One: Kagayaku Kisetsu he, developed by Nexton's sub-brand novamicus for the company's 30th anniversary.

name: Onee-san ga Tabetai no ha Kimi no...
Once Upon a Slime
summary: Once Upon a Slime is the first game that I am making in my career of a game developer and is an arenashooter / Bossbeater game about a little slime. Weapons are in some modes upgradable and there will be a leaderboard on which you can compare your scores to the top 100 players!

name: One Piece Odyssey: Reunion of Memories
summary: Come join the Straw Hats for a new and different way to experience One Piece Odyssey. One Piece Odyssey, Reunion of Memories is available in the Deluxe version of the game, and purchasable separately. Expansion content is available after players finish the main game. One Piece Odyssey is available for PlayStation4, PlayStation5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.

name: Onto Maizilind Unto Infinity: Act I - Destruction's Wake
summary: Onto Maizilind Unto Infinity is a 3 act game about the end of human civilization and the torment that consumes humanity on the other side of our long-awaited apocalypse.

name: Oni Oneesan
summary: Two Oni princesses are looking for a mate, one human looks to save his people by marrying into their kingdom. Before the Oni court approves however, he'll have to prove able to rein in their excesses, and maybe teach the two quarrelling sisters a thing or two about ruling.

name: Oneesan to Issho! Janken Paradise
summary: Adult FMV strip rock-paper-scissors title, allowing the players to choose between five different women, and decide which articles of clothing are removed after winning. Stripping your opponents rewards the player with a three minute long video.

name: On Air Island
summary:
'On Air Island' is set on a mysterious 'remote island' that is full of intrigue.
It tells the mysterious and horrifying story of the main characters trapped on a remote island.

You are the audience, but you are also the ones who can save or kill the characters as they run for their lives from the dangers that abound on the deserted island.
Will the cast be able to escape the island's labyrinth that is closing in on them and survive?

name: On Air!
summary: On Air! is a mobile game that puts the player in the role of an Honor Student at Hoseki Gaoka, a prestigious academy known for training top seiyuus (voice actors). Because the academy is facing bankruptcy, you’re entrusted with the task to help manage and train your fellow seiyuu schoolmates to save the school.

name: One Die All Dies: No Zuo No Die
summary: Like hard games? Control the hero jump to avoid obstacles by tap on the White area.Help the hero brothers go forward a dashed to the end. How long can you hold? feeling two heroes too easy? Try 3, 4, 5 heroes.

name: Only One Way Up
summary: Reach new heights in a mysterious world above the clouds, full of secrets to explore. Ascend on your journey and get as high as possible in Only One Way Up! Step up into a realm way above the clouds..

name: Only Climb: Better Together
summary: Tired of sitting on the ground? Take a sky-high journey with your friends in Only Climb: Better Together! Touch the clouds with your own hands and find out what's behind them, but remember, there are no easy paths…

name: Onka
summary: Explore the mansion and escape in this 3D horror game. Solve the riddles and escape from the ghosts that roam the mansion!

name: Only Down!
summary: Have game developers often forced you to climb somewhere with no purpose? This time, your goal is to hit rock bottom and nothing else. It should be simple enough, good luck to everyone.

name: One Deck Galaxy
summary: Roll your dice and cleverly use them to build up your civilization from its humble homeworld, growing to create a Federation spanning countless star systems.

name: One Night as Freddy
summary:
One Night as Freddy intends to give a faithful and fun twist on the Five Nights type of gameplay by instead giving you control of an Animatronics from the original game instead of the usual POV of a Nightguard.

The game lets you see through the eyes of popular animatronic Freddy Fazbear as he roams the games pizzeria attempting to enter a nightguards office.

name: Oni Academy
summary: Play as a new recruit to the "Oni Academy", an establishment which specializes in recruiting female demon hunters. Hunt down demons, advance your character and play alone or with friends.

name: Once Upon a Tile
summary: Once Upon a Tile is a strategic dungeon-builder, where you don't control the hero! Instead, you cleverly place dungeon tiles to guide your hero to victory - or to their demise, if you are careless. You will need to be tricky and clever in this dungeon-building puzzle game!

name: Only Ban!
summary: You will go on an exciting journey, where you will be waiting for various Easter eggs, references, as well as difficult obstacles, platforms, mazes that require reaction and the ability to control your character. Strive to get to the very top the fastest to prove your superiority!

name: One S'More
summary: Can you help your marshmallow friend to fulfill his dream of becoming a tasty S'More? One S'More is a challenging puzzle game, set in a tasty environment. Connect 2 chocolate biscuits and reach them with your marshmallow.

name: Ontotis
summary: Ontotis is a psychological horror game focusing on atmosphere, mystery and an engaging story. Uncover scattered clues to unveil the chilling fate of the house's residents, while encountering a mysterious humanlike figure seemingly connected to them in their haunting tale.

name: One Creek: The House
summary: When it's storming outside, and mom and dad are out at work, there's not a whole lot to do.

name: One Button Games 5-in-1
summary:
Challenge yourself with these 5 one-button fast-paced games.

In "B Cannon" you are moving around the screen and can reverse your direction by pressing a button. Your goal is to shoot the circles that are bouncing around. You aim automatically and shoot at the current aim position. Hold a button to shoot. The circles break up into smaller ones and you have to shoot them until they can no longer be broken down. The game is over when you touch any circle.

In "Cate P" you score points by destroying the caterpillars crawling around you. When you press a button you will rotate clockwise and shoot in the direction you were looking at before. Try to hit the caterpillars and avoid being hit by them. You score points by shooting the segments of a caterpillar. The game is over when any caterpillar touches you.

In "S Lanes" You are constantly moving between the four lanes on the left side of the screen. Your goal is to shoot enemies that are coming from the right to keep them from reaching the lanes. Hold a button to shoot and to move forward towards the enemies. Collect the coins that enemies drop after you destroy them to score points. The game is over when any enemy reaches any of the lanes.

In "Thunder" you are running in the middle of a thunderstorm. Collect the stars that form when lightning strikes the ground to score points. But avoid getting hit by lightning. Reverse your direction by pressing a button or by hitting the sides of the screen. The game is over when you get struck.

In "UD Cave" your screen is split in halves with a cave in each half. You control two characters simultaneously going through the caves on each side. The cave on the right is upside down. Press a button to make both characters go right. Collect coins on the way to score points. The game is over when either of the two characters hits the sides of the cave.

name: Onslaught
summary: A 2D hack and slash where you rapidly switch between three characters to decimate waves of enemies! Fight your way through dangerous areas, each with unique monsters and bosses.

name: Only One
summary: Immerse yourself in the chilling world of Only One, a spine-tingling horror experience that will leave you trembling with fear. Explore the depths of a haunted mansion, where darkness reigns and secrets lurk in every corner. Uncover the truth behind the paranormal occurrences.

name: Only Cum!
summary: You have an important challenge ahead of you to climb to the top! However, if you succeed in doing so, you will receive a very satisfying reward.. The most realistic animations and 3D models are waiting for you to Only Cum!

name: One Week at Flumpty's
summary: One Week at Flumpty's was the original third and final installment of the One Night at Flumpty's series, but it was later canceled and the name was repurposed into the One Week at Flumpty's trilogy of shorts.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Character Pass 2
summary:
Character Pass 2 contains three DLC Character Packs, each containing three playable characters, for a total of nine playable characters!

Includes:
- Character Pack 4: The Battle of Onigashima Pack
- Character Pack 5
- Character Pack 6
- One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 Onigashima Battle Law Costume (Character Pass 2 Bonus)

name: Only Down
summary: Only Down was made with speed runners in mind. Your skill will be tested. Victories are gained by the inch in this unforgiving puzzle platformer.

name: Only Up: With Friends
summary: Only Up: With Friends is a multiplayer parkour game where speed is essential. Race against your friends to the top by climbing a variety of dynamic obstacles. One mistake and its back to the start...

name: Only Up 64
summary: Only Up 64 is a level mod for Super Mario 64 inspired by the game Only Up. The level is currently the biggest level mod for Super Mario 64.

name: One More Dash
summary:
Dash. Collect. Die. Repeat.
A deceptively simple game about timing.

Say hello to your new bus / train / paraglider / waiting room / toilet buddy! From the makers of One More Line.

name: One More Bounce
summary: Simply draw a line to bounce your way to victory in this unique zen-like game!

name: One More Jump
summary: One More Jump is a hand-crafted arcade platformer from the team that brought you One More Line and Thumb Drift. Simple to learn one touch controls. Hard to master levels that will test your muscle memory, concentration and sanity!

name: One Life to Alice
summary: This game consists of two interconnected parts. The first part is a visual novel about a girl named Alice, living in the near future. The pleasant visual presentation and a story based on real events will not leave you indifferent.

name: One Last Tale
summary: The game allows 4 to 10 players to experience co-op and betrayal. You must comlete tasks while bewaring of the monsters among you. Whether to make best of your social deception and reasoning skills or just play it as a crazy party game is all up to you!

name: Only Jump!
summary: Only Jump is a timed vertical climber, jump by pressing space or A on your controller. Race to get to the top in the fastest time.

name: On the Island of Falling Stars: Chapter 1
summary:
As another hazy summer begins on the small island of Cóiméad, strange rumors start to circulate about the end of the world. A few whispers accumulate; the sea runs red, and the rains continue.

The first chapter covers three friends' search for the source of these rumors and what truth they may hold.

name: One Life Clicker
summary: A unique idle clicker game with RPG elements and hardcore survival mode with only one life available

name: One Humanity
summary: One Humanity is a new level for the 1994 id Software release DOOM II created by John Romero to support the people of Ukraine and the humanitarian efforts of the Red Cross and the UN Central Emergency Response Fund. 100% of the proceeds go toward this support.

name: One-Two Combo Bundle: Punch Club Franchise
summary: Enjoy the ultimate Punch Club experience in this knockout bundle!

name: Oniria
summary:
Oniria is a single-level PWAD for Doom II, authored by Aluqah and designed for ZDoom. The new color scheme (PLAYPAL and COLORMAP), which plays a significant role in the level, was created by Jon Dowland.

In Oniria, you are having a nightmare from which you cannot awaken. You find yourself in a bizarre world where everything is black-and-white with the exception of the color red. The only thing you can do is to explore the world with the hope that the nightmare would eventually come to an end.

name: Only in Passing
summary:
A bite-sized, slice-of-life, indie visual novel with a lo-fi aesthetic. It's all about those brief encounters we have during our daily lives.

The scenarios are randomized. And the visual novel can only be played once.

name: One-Armed Robber
summary: One-armed robber is a chaotic first-person heist game that centers around a uniquely challenging premise. Players take the role of a determined robber equipped with only one arm, tasked with pulling off daring heists on banks, shops, and various establishments.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3 - Story Pack
summary: Even more challenge and fun with the One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3 Story Pack, including 8 new mission packs & 23 new costumes for your favorite characters!

name: Only go up
summary: Get up there to avoid the rising water! It's scary, but you have to step up. It's up to you to adapt to reality or struggle.

name: One Direction
summary: Find All the different 1D's arriving on the red carpet.

name: Only Down
summary: Only Down is a platform jumping parkour game. It is produced by the independent studio OldCat Digital Studio, with a single person named OldCat. Only Down, as the name suggests, means players move from the sky to the ground or below, ultimately obtaining the treasure.

name: On a Summer Night
summary: "Today, I would like to tell you about one night. One night that changed my life." On a Summer Night is a short point-and-click visual novel.

name: Only Up!
summary: Have you ever wanted to walk through the peaks and have an eagle vision? To fly over the world like a God ! Embark on an exciting journey in Only UP: Rising ! Play as a lost pirate on an island sheltering the ruins of a Lost City in the middle of the Pacific !

name: One Piece Odyssey: Adventure Expansion Pack
On Life and Living
summary: In "On Life and Living", beyond metroidvania-style exploration and challenging encounters, players will also experience an emotional story of love, grief, and consequences. You are in control, shaping the course of this journey towards regeneration.

name: Only Straight and Up!
summary: This is a fun and hardcore roguelike platformer for 1-5 players in which you have to reach the coveted reward by overcoming various traps! Only a few can make it through...

name: One Perfect Day
summary:
One Perfect Day is a game that explores the topics of abuse and self-compassion. Encompassed in a first person puzzle adventure where players attempt to escape a time loop by solving non-linears puzzles in separate time periods with the use of chronological sequencing itself.

Explore Andy's alma matter and make use of a series of tools and memorabilia to help Andy discover the things that happened or could have happened and help him find his way to the truth of his past.

name: One Thousand and One Nights
summary: This game tells the story of the breathtaking adventures of the eastern Don Juan whose name is Habib in the gorgeous sultan's palace full of beautiful concubines, guards and treasures.

name: One Night: Burlesque
summary: Step into the smoky, seductive world of the Angels Den, a luxurious burlesque club. Get into the high heels of Holly, a talented dancer graced with a unique gift of telepathy. Help her on a desperate mission to save a friend from certain doom.

name: One Tap
summary: "One Tap" is a high-octane first-person shooter game that delivers an immersive and competitive gaming experience. It's all about the thrill of the game, the strategy, and the skill. The unique twist? You get to choose an in-game asset with special abilities that can turn the tide of the battle. The special characters in the game are digital assets or "NFT" stored using blockchain technology.

name: Oni Hunters
summary: Journey through Gironia's lands, where monsters roam and secrets await. Battle, fuse creatures, and decide your fate in the grand Monster Jubilee. Ready for the adventure?

name: One More Hound!
summary: Bit your top-scores in this wave-combat game!!

name: Only Multiplayer: Up!
summary: Get set to defy gravity, leap like never before, and experience the exhilarating world of parkour in a whole new light! This isn’t just your ordinary parkour jump simulator - it’s a dynamic ONLINE MULTIPLAYER adventure that transforms your every move into a gravity-defying spectacle.

name: Oni Station
summary: Oni Station is a horror game with roguelike and arcade elements where you pilot a train to outrun the creature chasing you. Carefully plan which stations to stop, search for resources and, above all, how far can you survive?

name: On a Cloudy Day
summary: On a Cloudy Day is a short, autobiographical vignette game by Emperatriz Ung. It is an interactive memory that captures the loneliness experienced during the hospitalization intake process. Designed to narratively compliment & be played alongside with Carol Mertz's "I'll be here."

name: One Night at Flumpty's
summary:
"Hi! I'm Flumpty Bumpty. I'm an egg. I'm immune to the plot and can transcend time and space. I brought you to this special place so we can be friends. I hope you are good at hiding, because I am coming after you. Have fun!" - Flumpty

Survive till 6 am by avoiding Flumpty and his friends. If you survive the entire night, you will have a new friend! If you don't, well... you'll see.

name: One Night at Flumpty's 2
summary:
Once again Flumpty Bumpty and his assortment of awesome friends have invited you (kidnapped) to a special place to play a game! All you need to do is avoid them untill it's 6am and they will become your brand new best friends. If you the get to you before 6am well... best not think about it.

This new and exciting place is full of different set of rules you will need to learn quick and your only tools available include a light switch computer running with an old battery and a couple of vents.

Good luck and hope you make some great life long friends...

name: Only Way Up! Parkour Jump Simulator
summary: Defy Gravity in Only Way Up! - The Ultimate Parkour Experience!

name: Only Fortress
summary: Become the hero of your own fortress! Defend, customize, and explore in this PvP & PvM strategy game. Unleash your skills, lead your troops, and dominate in the battles. Build, fight, and conquer on the open world cross-platform online game!

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Additional Episodes Pack
summary: Obtain Additional Episodes Pack for use with One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - The Battle of Onigashima Pack

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Ultimate Edition
summary: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 is the latest evolution of Pirate Warriors action! Based on the concept of 'experiencing a real One Piece battlefield,' buildings will come crashing down during the action and attacks will throw up smoke and dust, placing you in the thick of the One Piece world!

name: Only Wish
summary: Dive into Only Wish, where doors reveal secrets, chairs become treasures, and cars drive you into a vertical world of endless wonder!

name: On Tuesday, Trevor Found His Shovel
summary: A game about digging up the past.

name: One Button Run
summary: Press the button to reach your destination!

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Yamato's Grand Tour Logbook & Soul Map 1
summary: Yamato takes Oden's logbook as his personal bible. Set out with him on his own grand tour across various stages!

name: Online Obsession
summary: Have you ever had an online friend? What if you were to meet them in real life? Can you be sure that nothing will go wrong? Find out in this horribly adorable experience.

name: One, Two, Three Fiancées?!
summary:
You’ve been accepted to a prestigious school in the city, but you still need a place to stay. Luckily, your parents have a family friend who lives nearby. She also happens to have three lovely daughters who are all too eager to meet you once you arrive! It seems like a dream come true…

Until you learn you must marry one of them if you wish to keep your free housing! Each girl has her own quirks and struggles, but they all have one thing in common; their desire to know you better. Can you help these three girls navigate through the ups and downs of high school life and show them what a caring partner you can be?

name: Only You: Re-Cross
summary: One day an evil mark appears on Magami Yuuji's right arm. To protect the earth from the ancient, world-destroying evil which is honing in on it, the governments send assassins after Yuuji. To protect eight precious girls, and on advice from his Master Tiger Joe, he decides to fight - against the entire world, if necessary.

name: One Day After School
summary: Short doujin visual novel created as a test for further projects.

name: Only the Rich May Die
summary: Only the Rich may Die is both a Sokobon-style and platformer that will put your puzzle-solving, block pushing, jumping and throwing skills to the test. Within a mysterious and atmospheric world, a story unfolds.

name: Only You Can Prevent Containment Breaches
summary: Medium to large, semi-linear level with a dungeon ruin inside an underground base. Includes some custom audio and music.

name: Once Upon Atrocity
summary: Large, spacious Q3Gothic-style fortress in a blood canyon, featuring some modified monsters and an evil dragon boss.

name: One Thousand Cuts
summary: Expanded standalone version of sock's map from Func Map Jam 2: a medium-sized, IKblue-themed, partially ruined temple with two individual routes for replayablility. It comes with a set of medieval-style item boxes.

name: One More Shooter Game
summary: Your mission is simple but crucial: you must eliminate a specific number of enemies in each level to advance. The planet relies on your shooting skills to prevent the plague of these enemies from expanding.

name: On Him Their Lives Depend 01
summary: A large urban level with action aplenty

name: Only an Alien Going Up!
summary: "Only an Alien Going Up!" is a difficult 3D platformer where your only goal is to climb to the top, without checkpoints.

name: One Bear Army
summary: You are Bear, a veteran of the elite Navy Bears unit in One Bear Army – a 2.5D action-adventure game in which you will face the evil Professor Rat and his army.

name: One to Nine
summary: A puzzle game - fill the board with the same number.

name: Only Up 2
summary: Reach new heights in "Only Up 2," set in a mysterious world above the clouds, brimming with secrets waiting to be unearthed. Embark on an ascent like no other, the only limit is the sky.

name: Once Upon a Time There was a Twin-Tailed Sister Princess Who Was Very Unfriendly.
One Week With The Mafia
summary: After a misuse of your home address, and the general incompetence of an old friend, you find yourself stuck with the Italian mafia hunting you down. In this parody of Scott Cawthon's "Five Nights at Freddy's", it is up to you to stop the mafia from wasting you.

name: One Night in Kawami
summary: Meet a new friend in the dreamlike City of Rivers. One Night in Kawami is a short visual novel about meeting new friends in an unknown city and possibly reshaping reality as you thought you knew it.

name: Once Upon a Rogue's Tale
summary: Embark on a journey through your favorite fairytales in this charming roguelike deckbuilding board game. Will you help Little Red Riding Hood find her grandmother or help the Frog Prince break his curse? How the story continues is up to you....

name: One Night At Freddy's
summary: Try the real horror of the game One Night At Freddy's

name: One Week at Freddy's
summary: One Week at Freddy's is a joke fnaf fangame based on Five nights at Freddy's 2 + Doom II by mrbenio.

name: On the Axis
summary: Discover the simplicity and relaxation within On The Axis. An easy and calm puzzle game focused on mirrors and tiles.

name: OnlyUp!
summary: Have a fun and remember, the path in this game is only up.

name: OnCall
summary: On Call is a visual novel that takes you through a 3-day rotation at Merritt General Hospital. Build trust with your patients and their families to get them on the road to recovery. Manage your own stress while confronting these challenges or you may just crack under the pressure.

name: On Your Tail
summary: Embark on an intriguing seaside getaway you’ll never forget in On Your Tail, a sleuthy story-driven 3D life sim of relaxation, investigation, and knowing how to play your cards right.

name: One False Move
summary: A turn-based strategy game where every unit and choice matters. Master diverse terrains, manage resources, and command futuristic units in a quest for victory. Your battlefield awaits!

name: Oneirology Online
summary: in our dreams/online, are we alone?

name: Only Up Samarkand
summary: Only up Samarkand is a parkour game where speed and agility are important so as not to fall and start again! Reaching the end is an important milestone in the game.

name: One Military Camp: Multiplayer Mode
summary: Enjoy the ultimate strategic battles in One Military Camp Multiplayer Mode. Build your camp, recruit and train soldiers and send them on missions to conquer territories against your opponent. This online mode includes 10 maps, all 6 biomes and features such as minimap, voice chat and drone attacks.

name: Once First-Person Adventure
summary: Once First-Person Adventure is a first-person action adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic setting. As a volunteer, you go to conduct an unscheduled inspection of power plant points.

name: Onmyoudou Origins
summary: Onmyoudou Origins is an action Rpg with elements of Japanese folklore.

name: Ontranto
summary: Five map episode set in a medieval fantasy world, with many custom textures, a few new monsters and some other QC: starting in a dark swamp, the player has to travel through caverns and temples to a ship bringing him to the town of Ontranto, where he is to battle the Duke.

name: One Fine Tourney
summary: One Fine Tourney is a casual, single-player archery-puzzle game with over 40 handcrafted target challenges. Join 5 unique protagonists as they compete their way through a wild, unpredictable, medieval-style world and encounter everything from mythical creatures to chill concerts in the woods.

name: Onsui
summary: Onsui is a cosy puzzle game that has you match colourful creatures without any falling over the edge.

name: One Just Night
summary:
Our Lady of Possibility (“Billie” for short) has always been frustrated with the vagueness of her prophecy. While those around her see endless potential, she feels stagnant and unable to move forward to become something great.

When The Seeing One, the oracle for the city, calls for Billie, Billie hopes to finally get clarity on her prophecy. Unfortunately, the new addition to her prophecy only serves to make things more complicated for Billie when the prophecy points at Seeker of a Just Night - the incredibly stern individual who Billie has clashed with in the past.

Just Night is reluctantly willing to give Billie the day to see if they can find common ground to make the prophecy come true - after all, who can argue with fate?

name: Onwelt
summary: Indie Sandbox AFK Grinder

name: One Hour And A Straight Line
summary: 1 hour nonstop parkour with musical guns, wall climbing and platform building. Good to relax. Can you make it under 1 hour though?

name: Only Drive
summary: You are a professional racer.This time you will race against time for your dog's life.If you go slow, you and your dog will die.

name: One Shot at Love
summary:
Plagued by a series of losses, the Sea Dragons' only hope of regaining their footing is a new coach, that’s where you come in. As a former pro player, your insights could help lead the team to victory, but after cycling through so many unreliable mentors, many of the members are jaded and on guard.

Before you can even think about starting to train them, you’ll need to find a way to break through their icy barriers. Will your passion unite the team and lead them to victory, or are they doomed to fade from glory forever?

name: One Little Ghost
summary:
If you ever felt sorry for the ghosts, the orphans they left behind, and wondered what would happen when Pac-Man became the ruling elite, then this is for you.

Whilst researching to see if the ZX81 was capable of doing justice to an isometric game along the lines of Ant Attack! or KnightLore, Bob's Stuff coded a program to display a single height map of tiles, and it looked a bit like a maze.

Along with the code examples, he'd also been experimenting with the graphics required for such a game, and produced a cute little ghost. An idea then began to germinate... a maze, and some ghosts? Why not try a scrolling isometric Pac-Man?

He's still not sure if a full isometric game is possible (that's for another day) but a scrolling flat one certainly is, and he's really pleased with the results. It looks good, is fluid and responsive, and features most of the aspects of the original - including the (slightly bugged) A.I. and attack patterns. Having a ghost as the main character means that I've had to supplemented the concept of 'lives' for 'spirit' - I mean, a ghost doesn't have a life, does it? - which introduces a slight twist on how you play the game.

name: OnlyFap Simulator
summary: OnlyFap Simulator is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to make a post. After each level an amount of post becomes higher, and you need to hire manager and do analytics to build a huge fan base

name: Onward and Upward! DX
summary: Climb from the Earth to the Moon to try and solve an urban legend! Brave tough challenges as you float and grapple your way up to the tune of a great soundtrack! Be sure to bring a space suit, and get climbing!

name: One Night At Herobrine's
summary:
Watch the Cameras, Look at the doors, don't let them in to your room

Can You Survive Until 6AM?

name: On Christmas He Will Return Home
summary:
An experimental visual novel about abusive relationships (with prophetic destiny.)

A woman awaits for her love to return on Christmas.

With every day, his return becomes more inevitable.

name: Ongeki Bright Memory
summary: Ongeki Bright Memory introduced the "Memories of O.N.G.E.K.I" event, allowing players to unlock songs and items by completing specific chapter challenges. All songs from this event were made publicly available to all players in 2024.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Koby's Combat Chronicle & Soul Map 2
summary: Join the Marines' young hero, Koby, as he endures a journey of intensive special training!

name: One Night Heaven: Aka to Kuro no Hitobito ni Sasagu Hommage
summary:
High school at Shinjuku, Tokyo, but in imaginary world created by human brain.
Fates of 18 people are intertwined there. A girl is in love with a boy, but he only plays with her heart. One day illusion of the girl appears at school, and rumors about her suicide start to spread. At the same time Ryusei creates "Misuzu" and tries to infest people's minds with "Misuzu" through the internet.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - One Piece Film: Red Pack
summary: Play as three new characters with this fifth character pack! Wield weapons as your favorite characters from the hit movie One Piece Film: Red and enjoy even more Pirate Warrior action!

name: One Night
summary: Escape from the anime girls.

name: One More Wish
summary: Wander, jump, and fly upon the clouds, collects stars to grow your energy, help guffy villagers with their wishes, and finally rerun the abandoned ferris wheel. Life is not of great goals or loud slogans but of negligible yet sparkling wishes.

name: One Drop
summary: Help a tiny, fragile robot overcome treacherous obstacles and escape a desolate planet! An expansive cosmic adventure awaits you!

name: OnlyFuck: RuRu's Adventures
summary: RuRu wants to make money and have fun at the same time! Join her in this simulation of the very popular OF platform!

name: OnePunch
summary: Punch or be defeated, there can only be one outcome amidst this nonstop action! Match the timing of a string of never-ending sandbags to conquer!

name: One Military Camp: Christmas Season
summary: Celebrate Christmas with our new free DLC for One Military Camp. Customize your base with armored snowmen. an inflatable Santa, Toy trains and many other decorative items. Build your camp, train your troops and carry out missions to defeat Dragan with a merry mood.

name: On the Run: Rogue Heroes
summary: Gain strange abilities and evade enemy forces as you uncover a conspiracy! What will you do to learn the truth? Will you fight for others or save yourself?

name: Oneiric
summary: Dive into "Oneiric" a charming walking simulator. Play as a 7-year-old boy exploring a nostalgic world of dreams and solve the riddles in a single enchanting night. Short nap, thats 15 minutes game experience focused on visual aspect.

name: Onyx
summary: A more or less fortunate event led to you receiving your own piece of land, which you can freely develop. You can also explore the already accessible regions of Hyalen to complete quests, obtain new recipes, mine resources and improve your crafting skills.

name: OnlySociety: Secret
summary: The games are primarily action role-playing games. The player takes on the role of the protagonist, "Yue," defending the last stand of the town as part of quests given to them by locals during the death epoch involving recruiting members, growing, and gathering various resources to craft equipment.

name: Only Kick
summary: It's a kick damage simulation game! The physical animation of the characters can be enjoyed only with back and forth movement and kicks. Aim at the enemy's weakest point. If you update your maximum damage and KO... It will be sent to the Steam leaderboard

name: One Dollar Simulator
summary: This is, in truth, the best simulator of 2020! This simulator will transform your dollar from your ordinary and everyday world - into a dollar of the world of beauty and harmony!

name: Oni no Yakata
summary: Oni No Yakata ("Mansion of the Oni") is a retelling of the Ao Oni story, told from the perspective of a new cast with familiar, yet original maps and locations, and a different narrative. You play as Ayana Hasegawa, an eighteen year old Japanese high school student in the last month of her school career. As one last fun adventure with her friends, they plan a trip to an allegedly haunted mansion on the outskirts of town. Little do they know, things wouldn't turn out as they had planned.

name: Oni No Kenkyuushitsu
summary: Oni No Kenkyuushitsu ("Laboratory Of The Oni") is a sequel to Oni No Yakata, set 10 years in the future, in the year 2028. You once more play as Ayana Hasegawa as she enters a new job as an intern at Crovich Research Facility, hoping to find a solution to the existence of the Oni that cost her the life of one of her friends, and the lives of many others before them. Little does she know, a combination of poor containment procedures and upper management with ulterior motives will cause the facility to unexpectedly release its specimens and cause chaos.

name: One Military Camp: Commander Goals
summary: Complete new challenges and get rewards in Commander Goals DLC for One Military Camp. Now you have a new way of improving your camp economy, but it wont be easy; reach certain goals in building, training, defense... either in campaign or sandbox mode, and gain extra money for your war efforts.

name: One More Gate: Companion#1 DLC
summary: Incognito isn't just any Squirrol… This companion can sneak in anywhere! This fearless red-haired critter loves changing clothes: glasses, caps, fake moustaches… Prepare to be surprised at the stunning disguises!

name: One More Gate: Companion#2 DLC
summary: Vivaldi's bark is all rhythm! The perfect all-season fighting companion. This little Trunknid was nearly firewood. The terrifying prospect resulted in completely wacky foliage! One day all's blooming, and the next all the branches are bare!

name: One More Gate: Companion#3 DLC
summary: Gon is a sweet little Dragoone but not so easy to tame! Naturally wary, Gon often changes color to blend into the environment. You'll have to be patient to tame those chameleon scales. It'll be worth the trouble, though!

name: Oni 2
summary: An unreleased sequel to Oni which would have been developed by Angel Studios and would’ve improved upon the combat system.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - One Piece Film: Red Anime Song Pack
