name: Only High
summary: A 3D platformer where you explore the dark cyberpunk world. You have to get way up from the underground facility to the spaceship. Discover secrets, play with friends, drive cars, and many more in Only High.

name: Only Golf
summary: Only Golf is a challenging golf game that puts players' skills to the test.

name: One More Day
summary: ¡Welcome to One More Day! Embark on an exciting and challenging experience where fashion and survival intertwine in this pixel art 2D game. Confront the dark threat of endless hordes of zombies as you embody a brave hero, equipped only with trusty underwear! Survive One More Day.

name: OneState
summary: OneState is the world's first RolePlay game with an open world and 500+ people online in one map! Choose your own path in OneState!

name: One Shot Gladiator
summary: Top down arena shooter. You can pick up different weapons and health packs, but you can only use them once.

name: OneBit Jetpack
summary: A little high score game for the Playdate inspired by the 80s classic Jetpac.

name: OneBit Demon Attack
summary: A little Playdate game inspired by the Atari classic.

name: One More Night
summary: You will have to survive zombies and mysterious creatures in a fantasy world, in which you find your lost brother, while you will level up and you will have 2 weapons with you throughout the adventure, you will be able to explore a giant world without restrictions

name: On Track
summary: On Track is a cozy productivity tracker to help you rejuvenate, relax, and focus on tasks you want to accomplish. Watch a lush landscape roll by as you watch from your cozy train seat. Set a timer to focus, manage a todo list with all your goals, and relax as you stay on track.

name: Only Pinball
summary: At 'Only Pinball' you can expect pinball tables in the style of the 80s, 90s and modern. You get realistic physics, elaborately modeled tables, atmospheric lighting, high-quality sounds and exciting themes.

name: Once Upon a Fight
summary: The story of your journey has begun to be written. Choose from a variety of different characters, each with unique abilities, in this chaotic multiplayer party game set in magical and fantastical lands. Whether alone or with allies, carve your name in history for eternity in Once Upon a Fight!

name: Only Climber
summary: Only Climber is a game to reach the top, created by combining many platform elements. It has a single-player structure in the FPS genre. Feel the challenge in the world of many different themes in this game, which shows that reaching the top has never been this difficult.

name: Online Car Simulator
summary: Online Car Simulator, is a simulation game where you can go from being a rookie car salesman to a regular dealer. Modify cars freely and try to create the most valuable car. Meet real people in the common lobby, buy or sell cars. Race them to show the speed and power of your own car.

name: Once a Porn a Time 2
summary: Once a porn a time 2, is an adventure style visual novel with high-quality animations, Oriental Princesses, Romances and other strange creatures that you have to bang.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Path to the King of the Pirates & Soul Map 3
summary: Gol D. Roger, the King of Pirates, a man who took everything the world had to offer. Push yourself to the limit as you attempt to surpass his legend!

name: Onimusha: Warlords - Genma Seal Box
summary: A special release of the remastered version of Onimusha Warlords that comes with the soundtrack of the game and a wall scroll.

name: One Piece: Dream Pointer
summary: In this three-dimensional vertical screen video game, players can recruit heroes from the One Piece universe and relive moments of the Straw Hat Pirates’ adventures.

name: One Last Adventure
summary: It's time for one last adventure! A compact(?) pixelart metroidvania.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Legend Dawn Pack
summary: Play as three new characters with this sixth character pack! Wield weapons as these legendary characters and enjoy even more Pirate Warrior action!

name: On the Bubble
summary: Inspired by classic platforming games, On the Bubble is an action-packed 3D platforming experience for fans of fast-paced games. The level editor allows anyone to make their own creations to be completed at breakneck speeds.

name: One Last Dinner
summary: You are a famous detective. Examine the evidence around you, read the notes left for you and listen to audio recordings, follow clues, write down your findings, interrogate suspects. How would you like to be the shining star of the scene?

name: One Socket
summary: Charge the generator to power your devices, but be careful, you only have One Socket to work with. Make tough decisions to keep you safe from the monster in the dark while you solve the mysteries that will free you. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Zorojuro Costume
One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Soba Mask Costume
On Mount Ségou
summary: On Mount Ségou is a short, kinetic visual novel with an atmospheric, dark fantasy story. Ellie and Captain Syna of the Azurium Air Fleet travel to Mount Ségou to offer a prayer to the Nameless One.

name: Onychomp: Lush Journey
summary: Meet the moon at the highest floor before the night is over in this high speed, roguelike dungeon crawler. Become the werewolf rat and chomp on every creature in your path, even a vampire serpent.

name: One Iced Latte With Your Breast Milk, Please!
summary: Help the cute barista Moka-chan and goth barista Karina-chan make Milk Milk Coffee the most popular place in Tokyo! Brew coffee in a relaxing atmosphere, guess customers' wishes, beat competitors, win the hearts of critics and pretty girls.

name: OneFistZone
summary: Undefeated in underground fighting, Yahiroako went pro. However, her first match was against with a superhumanly strong opponent!

name: One Barbarian Futa Tribe Chapter 1: Violet
summary: While out of your depths searching for a lost caravan you accidentally stumble into a snare trap. You are then captured by a tribe of very well-endowed futa barbarians who are unsure what to do with you.

name: One Barbarian Futa Tribe Chapter 2: Red
summary: After being taken prisoner by a Barbarian, you find yourself stuck in their camp. It's now time for you to try and find a way to escape. But, do you even want to escape?

name: One Fenix Down
summary: A retro-inspired, classic turn-based RPG for those with nostalgia for the '90s golden era. Explore a vast world with 14 playable characters, fight hundreds of unique enemies, and delve into an epic story of war, betrayal, and redemption.

name: Only Up: Skibidi Together
summary: Only Up: Skibidi Together is an intense online parkour game of precision and speed. Jump and climb over various obstacles, each with unique challenges and surprises. The slightest mistake can result in a fall to the starting line.

name: One Lie
summary: One Lie is a choice-driven adult visual novel about a young man not having the best start to his adulthood. His best friend betrays him and he decides to start his life somewhere else. Will he find peace, love and new friendships? Of course, he will. With whom? That's up to you.

name: One Night With Baba Yaga: A Gnosis Tale
summary:
You are Clara, a young woman desperate to save her family. You've exhausted all options except one: seek the fabled Mother of All Witches, Baba Yaga.

The witch offers to help you... if you can survive a night in her hut. But you won't just have to survive the monsters and miscreants within... you must find Baba Yaga's personal chambers. Only then can you make your case. It is a dire, seemingly hopeless situation...

name: One Last Breath: Seeds of Hope Edition
Onoow
summary: TALESCAPE - ONOOW is an escape room game for single player. Explore in the story-rich tales and find out what the truth hidden in the mysterious story. Get items and use or combine them for escape from the story!

name: One Military Camp: Biomes
summary: Explore new ways to organize your camp with the new versions of biomes for One Military Camp. It is now possible to choose any of the five biomes in their clear version.

name: Onibi
summary: Dash, possess, and explore your way through different areas as you accompany a child on their adventures as their fledgling guardian spirit.

name: One Day Hike
summary: ONE DAY HIKE is a brief interactive fiction where you revisit an old, familiar hiking trail and recount the memories that you've tried-- and failed-- to leave behind.

name: One Good Turn Deserves Another
summary: The game is based on the "Solomonar" myth from Romanian folklore. Solomonars are wizards, blessed with the power of controlling the weather. It is said that each Solomonar is able to control a Balaur, a giant winged snake, which has the ability to enhance their already supernatural powers. One legend states that these wizards travel from village to village, usually dressed as beggars, and ask for food or shelter. Denying their request will bring bad weather over the village, but they also offer rewards to those who help.

name: One: Secret Empire
summary: Join Kain, Omega-7’s last survivor, uncovering secrets on an SCP Federation asteroid. Unravel the truth, endure chaos, and delve into a conspiracy that could reshape SCP history in this sci-fi thriller.

name: One More Encounter
summary:
On November 17, 1992, a small group of three developers released a video game like no other. Only available for the NEC PC-9801 computer, this was the most ambitious game the industry had ever conceived. Unfortunately, it was a sales failure and was lost in the abyss of time.

More than 30 years later, One More Encounter (a.k.a OME) has been partially revived. One More Encounter was a dungeon crawler where the important thing was not the motif, but the journey itself and the characters we encountered along the way. Unfortunately, only 0.35% of the total game could be saved. That is, of the more than two thousand possible encounters in the game, this version only contains seven.

Be that as it may, this is a look at a world that could have been, an industry that never really took hold, and a type of videogame that, so many years later, we are still struggling to make.

name: Onmyoji: Beyond Time
summary: When you were a child, the death of your mother closed the door on a supernatural world that few are able to see. Now in your final year of university, your father’s death wrenches that door open again, awakening strong spiritual powers that have long been dormant in you.

name: Oneiro Man
summary: Oneiro Man is a 30-minute game aiming to be fun and humorous. In it, you'll have to write reports and play various mini-games. The game features 3 different endings, depending on your performance at work.

name: One Hell of a Maid
summary:
'One Hell of a Maid' is a short game, where you play as a maid cleaning one's apartment.

Submission to Ludum Dare 55.

name: One for the Road
summary: Originally part of a compilation, One for the Road is a clone of Pac-Man, where the player drives a car around the maze picking up the Cat's Eye's, avoiding the hostile road signs. The road signs become temporarily harmless after collecting an oil can.

name: One for the Road / Mutations
summary:
A compilation of the two following games:

One for the Road - a clone of Pac-Man, where the player drives a car around the maze picking up the Cat's Eye's, avoiding the hostile road signs. The road signs become temporarily harmless after collecting an oil can.

Mutations - a clone of Spawn of Evil, where the player, as a patrol unit, must seek and destroy the enemy mutants, cloners, asteroids and battlecars.

name: Oneirophobia
summary:
"I'm Gary Walker, just an average 27-year-old office worker. Always hunting for cheaper places to live.

So, when I heard about this super cheap apartment, I ignored the rumors of people going missing. I mean, there's always a catch with cheap rent, right?"

name: One Piece: Starboard
summary: An RPG Maker MZ adventure game inspired by the One Piece series, set 20 years after the events of the original story. Take control of Alphonse D. Orion, a mysterious amnesiac with a wish to see the stars of the Grand Line.

name: One-Off
summary: The sixth game released by Gotmail. The player must escape a garage.

name: One-Off R
summary: The seventh game released by Gotmail, a more difficult version of One-Off. It features sound/music and different puzzles. The player must escape a garage.

name: Oniko Kororin Game
summary: Characters from Onigiri High School are now available as cute puzzles! Supported by UUUM, the song in the opening movie is actually NMB48! Roll the rice balls, stack them high, make them big, and go through various gimmicks to avoid red spots (!?) Get the "Legendary Salmon"!

name: One More Gate: A Wakfu Legend - Complete Edition
summary: Are you ready to go through the gate?

name: One-inch Tactics
summary: Turn the tide of the war with nuanced strategies in One-inch Tactics.

name: ONF: Tatakau Rasetsu he
summary:
Parody of the visual novel ONE ~Kagayaku Kisetsu e~
Mizuka and Akane routes are retold with health bar concept, parody and numerous immediate death situations.

name: One Chance
summary: One Chance is an addictive game that puts your reaction time to the test.

name: OneKind
summary: Three bad friends on a farm... Fast or slow, brave or master of hiding, everyone is the enemy... However, the only owner of the farm... Remember, the most reliable defence is hiding... This game invites you into an exciting world, whether you are a hunt, a huntsman or a spy!

name: Onírillo
summary:
Accompany IlloJuan in one of his many dreams without any explanation. What will be the goal of this dream? Where does everything really happen? Is it really all a dream? All these and many more questions will or will not be answered in this adventure created by BlotYolo Games.

Enter the dream world and discover its deepest secrets!

Created for IlloJam.

name: One Way Lane
summary: Riley faces the adjustment of entering adulthood. But in order to establish a happy future she must first face what is haunting her in the past. Will you get lost in wonderland or come out a new you?

name: One Box One Goal
summary:
You're in a box and you have to climb as high as possible... if you can make it.
One Box One Goal is a game inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy but made in third person.

name: One-sided Loneliness
summary: 'One-sided loneliness' is a short clicker game, where you take care of a cute alien goat boy. Made for Summer Slow Jams 2023: Idle, using creative theme 'Mutation'.

name: One Room: Prisoner's Dilemma
summary: 6 People - 1 Room - 1 way to escape. Welcome to One Room - Prisoner's Dilemma.

name: Once in Hell
summary: Once in Hell: I tried to create a game where i union History,Horror,Riddle and Parkour. In game u can use: Inventory,torch,flashlight and everything that can help you to survive. I am sure that, time you'll spend on a game will be enjoyable.

name: Only Way is Down
summary: Embark on a purr-fectly perilous adventure as this lil kitty cat took an unfortunate cat-nap and ended up stranded sky high! With no way but down, unleash your feline agility and platforming prowess to navigate your descent through the urban jungle in this whimsical and gravity-defying escapade!

name: One more!
summary: Drink a mug is a clicker game where you drink a mug.

name: One Night With Kawaii
summary: Run and hide! Find a way out before she catches you.

name: Once Upon a Galaxy
summary:
Once Upon a Galaxy is a mobile based card battler brought to you by Million Dreams.

Recruit a rag-tag squad of fairy book characters, heroes from legend, scheming villains and treasure hoarding dragons as they do battle across the galaxy where last one standing wins.

name: One in a Krillion
summary: Prepare for deep-sea action! Lead swarms of krill against predators looking for their next meal. Utilize the strength of a krillion krill to swat away your enemies. With hammers, scissors, and more unique construct abilities, master the way of the krill and lay claim to your home.

name: One Room Nightmare
summary: Turn-based strategy horror. Terror in a confined space. Manage your limited power and time to protect yourself from the oncoming enemies and survive until dawn.

name: Once a Porn a Time: Porn and Cards
summary: Porn and Cards is an adult visual novel/turn-based card game with stunning 2D visuals and a fun, immersive narration in the Galactic Wild West

name: One of Them
summary: One of Them is a Social Deduction sci-fi horror game. Up to 12 players are playing either as a Human Astronaut trying to escape, or as a disguised Alien Beast out to kill everyone.

name: Onslaught on the Solar Frontier
summary: Take on the enemy onslaught in this top-down cover shooter roguelite.

name: Onsen Nozokimi Daisakusen
summary: Onsen Nozokimi Daisakusen is a flash game in the Persona series available on the official Atlus website made to promote the release of Persona 4.

name: One Step to Rest
summary: Cross an unknown nation to escape a devastated and scarce place, seeking a land full of resources to bring rest and prosperity to its people, who bet their very lives on your journey. Defeat monsters trying to stop you in a hack'n slash, procedurally generated game!

name: One Last Raid
summary: An arena based roguelike action RPG where you play as a skeleton warrior, who fights waves of enemies with diverse abilities. Each run you create a unique build by selecting different skills on each level up and picking up loot from fallen enemies.

name: One Million Checkboxes
summary: An incremental browser game in which people can check and uncheck boxes on a public page.

name: OneShot: The Pancake Episode
summary: It's the 10th anniversary of OneShot, and Niko has decided to share their mama's pancake recipe with the world! Join them on a special interactive cooking lesson in OneShot Cafe, the coffee shop AU where nobody dies.

name: Onekey
summary: Using only one key to activate scenery, guide the tribesman to safety.

name: One Long Night with the Circleheads
summary: It's the worst storm in years. You're on the run and must seek shelter in a nearby shed. Little do you know that the sphere-headed beings that inhabit it have FUNFUNFUN plans for you... Can you survive One Long Night with the Circleheads?

name: Only One Sword
summary: Join the epic journey of a sword rising from dungeons to the surface. Defeat enemies, grow stronger, and return to your master because they need you!

name: On a Journey RPG
summary: A Golden-Age of 2D JRPG's returns with Turn-Based Combat & Retro-Inspired Graphics! Adventure across the world, meet new friends and unlock powerful Summon Monsters as you battle against a truly formidable enemy in this Story-Rich JRPG

name: One Minute To Close
summary: 1 Minute to Close is a stealth adventure game set in a supermarket after hours. Utilize the environmental interactions and physics based tactics to outsmart the shop assistants who use an advanced AI that learns from your actions.

name: One Night At The Shack
summary: One Night at the Shack is a psychological horror adventure where you explore a sinister shack haunted by vengeful spirits. Engage in intricate puzzles tailored to each ghost's tragic story, unraveling mysteries and uncovering the dark truth behind their haunting.

name: One Hell of a Turnabout
summary: Apollo is kidnapped from the Wright Anything Agentcy, what hell of a turnabout has he been forced into this time...

name: One Helluva Reskin for Pizza Tower
summary: Aiming to replace every major character AND boss with beloved characters from Spindlehorse's Helluva Boss and Hazbin Hotel (mostly Helluva). Featuring Moxxie in the place of Peppino trying to save I.M.P along with Millie and that hellhound no one cares about.

name: On All Clear Days
summary: A short visual novel set in the post-war world

name: Only Up: Skibidi
summary: Only Up: Skibidi is an exciting multiplayer 3D platformer. Overcome challenging obstacles and climb higher and higher. Attention and focus will help you reach new heights, and this rule applies both in the game and in life.

name: One More Game
summary: A role-playing game that you will collaborate with your junior sisters and challenge them to compete in esports games, helping them win the final championship.

name: One Dash Star
summary: In One Dash Star, you guide the Playing marbles towards the star by swiping and releasing it. On this exciting journey, you'll navigate through fixed and moving obstacles and save the star. Each level presents new challenges, and the diverse obstacles will test your focus and reflexes.

name: One Dreamy Night
summary: One Dreamy Night is a traditional RPG game that takes inspiration from Yume Nikki to create a surreal world with oddities at every turn. There's things to find to increase your stats and skill set, along with wacky individuals to encounter. You'll get to the end as long as you look and explore.

name: Only Up Rush
summary: Jump, parkour and compete against yourself in thousands of metres of tough challenges. Race the clock, beat it, break records and reach unprecedented heights!

name: OnlineCTR
summary:
Naughty Dog developed and released one of the greatest arcade racers for the PlayStation 1 known as Crash Team Racing (CTR) in 1999.

We spent years disassembling the original Naughty Dog assembly/machine code back to C and managed to make it playable online without harming the original gameplay. We also added some new exciting features along the way.

The result is the original CTR game we know and love but finally available to be played with up to 8 players with anyone in the world... online.

name: Onsei Kanjou Sokuteiki: Kokoro Scan
summary: While all games from Sega's Naruhodo edutainment series did not garner much mention, this game did. This is due to its bizzare premise and unique use of the Nintendo DS microphone picking up nuances in emotions of the voice. This technology was developed by SGI Japan.

name: Onward: Asylum
summary: Going onwards as we escape this horrific asylum— an indie 2D horror sidescroller where your task is to get out of the facility without getting captured by the monster itself.

name: Onikura
summary: A fast-paced and challenging boss-rush with options to customize your playstyle as you progress. Defeat all enemies in your path with unique attacks, specials, parries, and abilities.

name: Only Climber 2
summary: Only Climber is a game to reach the top, created by combining many platform elements. It has a single-player structure in the TPS genre. Feel the challenge in the world of many different themes in this game, which shows that reaching the top has never been this difficult.

name: Onegai My Melody: My Melody Adventure
summary:
After reading a book about certain place, Melody embarks in a journey to have an exciting adventure. What dangers await her there?

First shown in the Winter C3 of 2023, this was a showcase of a simple spritesheet, and then became his own thing. This was a project of one year, circling back to january of 2023 all the way up to january of 2024.
Without further ado, the full thing

name: On the Keyboard
summary:
This is a keyboard action game where you control a virtual keyboard to carry a Sphere.

The controls are simple: just follow your intuition and press the keys. The virtual keys that correspond to the ones you press will move, and the Sphere will move in response to the force from the keys. Your goal is to carry the Sphere to the finish line without letting it fall off the keyboard.

However, you can't move the Sphere directly, so it often won't behave as you'd like. To manage this irregular Sphere behavior, you’ll need to quickly identify and press the right key from the 40 available. This makes the game more action-packed than it may initially seem.
Moreover, even though it's challenging enough to move the Sphere as intended, the path to the goal is filled with various obstacles that block your way. Overcoming these obstacles requires flexible thinking and skillful manipulation of the keyboard.

Additionally, this game also functions as a typing game, as understanding the spatial arrangement of the keys is crucial. It can improve typing accuracy for both beginners and experienced typists. Why not sharpen your typing skills while having fun with an action-packed game?

And be careful not to break your keyboard!

name: On Sunday 2
summary:
A narrative-based action game with adventure elements.

- Oppose the whimsical bosses by finding out how to pass by them
- Stay unharmed with all those different enemies
- Limited Praying power only available on some levels
- Press X to change the situation with the Prayer
- Pass through the mini story of passions and ire boiling in one tiny soul

name: Onion Delivery
summary: Can you survive the work-week in Zorrg city? Do your best to make deliveries amidst the chaos!

name: One Life: Parkour Project
summary: Are you looking for a REAL parkour game but haven't found anything? One Life - Parkour Project is the one for you! Relax, headphones up, customize your character and do parkour... EVERYWHERE!

name: Once Clover Died
summary: Clover is a black cat who lost one of her 9 lives after being scared to death by a recent break-in. With 8 lives left, she treads the world very carefully to avoid any other incidents that might lead to losing even more.

name: One Skill
summary: In this platformer you have 4 different skills but you can only use one at a time. Choose a skill to complete each of the sections across 4 levels.

name: One Room Dungeon
summary: A roguelike team builder, auto-battler meets inventory management, where you are a little dungeon keeper who has to fit minions, artifacts, and items in a very tidy way in his tiny one-room dungeon to empower himself to protect the dungeon from the raiding adventurers.

name: On Wings Bringing Sleep
summary: 'On Wings Bringing Sleep' is the story of Morgaine, an outcast among the fae as her people's power is ever-dwindled by the advance of human technology. When she meets a mysterious and enthralling human girl within the forest one day, Morgaine grows certain that this girl is in need of her magical protection. But Ilse has secrets of her own, and the growing feelings between them may cost more than either girl might ever pay...

name: One Piece: Ambition
summary: The mobile game "One Piece: Ambition" is developed by the Morefun studio based on "ONE PIECE". It was developed by the original team of the "Naruto Mobile" under the studio, and received the support of Bandai Namco. The art style is delicate and highly restored. At the same time, combined with the research and development of Unreal Engine 4, the visual effect of the game's fighting blow is enhanced, and the fineness of the picture is further improved, so that players can also experience the sailing journey in the original animation.

name: Onion Detective 2
summary: The sequel to the acclaimed game "Lil Onion Detective"! Play as Detective Onion and solve all the crimes in your little town!

name: One Turn Kill
summary: One Turn Kill is a PvE card game where card drawing and deck control are the keys to victory. Engage in battles limited to a single turn for an exhilarating, suspenseful experience.Join the protagonist in a pixel art wasteland to face off with the strongest of enemies and see what story awaits.

name: One Map: Never Ending Battle Royale
summary: One Map is an online shooter where the entire world fights in the same never-ending battle. No lobbies, no waiting—just instant action. The dynamic map adjusts to the player count, ensuring non-stop combat. Survive, compete, and help break the world record for the most players online in a game.

name: One More Plate
summary: One More Plate is a physics-based quirky funny game. Here, you'll serve food on ANYTHING but proper plates! Keep your balance, aim carefully, and then you will be rewarded with…… One More Plate!

name: Oni's Tale
summary: Oni’s Tale is a vibrant 2D anime-style platformer and typing adventure inspired by an ancient Japanese story. Join Oni siblings Gomu and Momo on a journey through a fantastical world filled with puzzles, challenges, and wonder. Test your skills and uncover a magical tale of friendship and discovery!

name: Only Up: Lizards Must Fall
summary: Only Up: Lizards Must Fall is an incredible multiplayer parkour game where precision and speed are important. Jump and climb over various obstacles. Defeat the cursed Lizards. The slightest mistake can result in falling to the starting location and your Rus brothers will stop respecting you.

name: Only Arrows
summary: You are a block. You move with arrow keys. Aspiration languishes in the factures of psyche.

name: One Boss One Fight
summary: One Boss One Fight is an Action Roguelike game that center around a single epic battle. Many skills to choose from, multiples phases, complex patterns, challenges and more! Step into the arena and face off against Death!

name: Only a Billion?!
summary: Congratulations, you won a billion dollars! Now it's time to find a way to spend it. It might prove more difficult than it sounds.

name: Onibito Kiki
summary: Experience ONIBITO KIKI’s first game adaptation in 90s-style 2D action! Play as KIKI, leader of the ONIBITO clan, using special abilities to conquer tough missions. Enjoy retro pixel art combined with modern gameplay—join KIKI on an epic adventure!

name: On My Way Home
summary: You're standing at the bus stop, eager to get home, when suddenly, the unexpected happens. Desperation pushes you to knock on the door of a nearby house, hoping for help, but stepping inside turns out to be a mistake you’ll regret.

name: One Way Ticket
summary:
I was heading for a new life and my train brought me here. Nice town: friendly people, corn cuisine, mysterious architecture...

So why am I sure that I need to get out of here as fast as possible?

name: Oni Magatsu Toki
summary: A girl wakes up to find the world has been overtaken by God. Being the only human left, Okappa has no choice but to survive in this strange world. Her only companion is a mysterious white fox who strums a guitar.

name: Once Upon a Time in the 70s
One Move Away
summary: One Move Away is a cozy, first-person puzzle game where you pack your belongings for another move and embark on a new chapter in life. With each move, you step into the lives of three unique characters, uncovering their personal stories through the items they take with them—or leave behind.

name: Onimusha: Way of the Sword
summary:
Fight through bloodstained battlefields of intense swordplay action. Explore the historic Japanese capital of Edo-era Kyoto, twisted by malevolent clouds of Malice.
With every stage cloaked in mystery, danger and intrigue. Battle against monstrosities from the underworld known as Genma in a tale of dark fantasy.
Follow the tale of a samurai who wields the Oni Gauntlet, a mystical artifact that grants its bearer the power to slay Genma.
Through gritty, blood-soaked brawls, he searches for his reason to fight. What fate awaits at the end of his path?

name: One Room: Yui Hanasaka Memorial
summary: A new immersive animated novel game where you can experience the story of Yui Hanasaka, the main heroine of the popular short anime series OneRoom, from the protagonist’s point of view.

name: One Dog's Stay
summary: A quiet story of a dog's days, woven in MS Paint-style graphics.

name: OneShot: Frostide
summary:
Embark on a short journey with Niko through the snow covered world you both once helped save!

Sneakily leave behind gifts for the people you've met along your previous journey, and maybe even get one yourself!
Save Progress:

You can safely close the game to save your progress.
Saved mod progress will not interfere with your vanilla or other mod saves.

name: One Last Story
summary: Do a writer's last words mean anything to the living? A story about death and the (idealization or fear of a possible) future.

name: Oneiro(Phobia/Phrenia)
summary:
ONEIRO(PHOBIA/PHRENIA) is a game about my fear of dreaming and my occasional inability to separate my dreams from reality.
In this experience the player zaps between the channels of a collective unconscious; the dreams of me and my loved ones, molded to fit into the confines of a grainy CRT TV screen.

name: OnAir Airline Manager
summary: Create and manage your very own airline in a persistent online world. Start small with a single aircraft, grow your fleet, and explore endless opportunities to build a thriving aviation empire.

name: Once Upon a Dungeon: Infinity
summary: Travel through dark dungeons, defeat dangerous creatures, and collect unique loot as you play endlessly in this hardcore, traditional roguelike.

name: Only One
summary: Kanye West's "Only One" is a video game about his mother "traveling through the gates of heaven". The title is shared with a song released by Kanye 2 years prior. In his conquest to see the game realised Kanye was turned down several times but now it seems progress has started to be made.

name: Only Out
summary: “Only Out” is a cooperative survival game for two players. Set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, you and your partner must navigate a desolate village plagued by scarcity and danger. Trust each other, strategize together, face the relentless zombie threat, and uncover the only path to survival.

name: One Last Job
summary: One Last Job is a moddable team management game, where you work to build your reputation as a fixer by successfully completing jobs with your crew.

name: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny
summary: Reclaim your destiny. Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny returns with higher resolution graphics and modernised controls to perform issen critical counter attacks and intense swordplay. Experience this dramatic revenge story set in Feudal Japan.

name: Only False
summary: Only False is a party game that blends bluffing and strategy, spiced up with a dash of dark humor. In Only False, a game for those who can’t get enough lies, you’ll sometimes lie like a politician, and sometimes think as strategically as Sun Tzu.

name: Oniwaki Village
summary: "Oniwaki Village" is a first-person Japanese horror adventure game set in a Japanese village that has been abandoned due to an incident. Players endure horror as they explore the village and pursue the mystery of the incident....

name: Onamae Battle
summary: ”Onamae Battle” is an easy-to-play game in which you simply enter your favorite ‘Onamae’ and the game will automatically battle for you! The name automatically determines the battle power, so it is easy to enjoy regardless of age or gender. You can also add your favorite images to the battle screen!

name: One Girl's Trash
summary: Maggie is a simple girl. She doesn't want any trouble, nor does she start any trouble. But sometimes trouble finds you despite your best attempts to avoid it. When Maggie's trash goes missing, she does whatever she can to ensure she gets it back.

name: One Turkey, Two Turkeys
summary: A game about counting turkeys. Inspired by the Rifftrax riff of "One Turkey, Two Turkeys".

name: One Minute
summary: Dive into the frantic universe of One Minute, a roguelite game like no other where every second counts! Designed to be fast, accessible, and addictive, this game offers an intense experience entirely controlled with your mouse.

name: On Roads Between
summary: Take photos of horrifying monsters and sell them to the news. Just don't get too greedy or you might have taken your last...

name: Only for Gamers
summary: The game was designed for only Pro gamers. There are many hard obstacles in the game. You have to find a correct solution to overcome all the obstacles. However, It will not be as easy as you imagine.

name: One Million Stars
summary: Get stars, avoid monsters. The rules are simple, but the goal massive. Pilot 4 different ships, choose stackable upgrades, and grab wild powerups in an endless, dynamically generated roguelite arcade space adventure. Take each run as far as you can, banking progress on the road to ONE MILLION STARS.

name: One True Path
summary: An adventure mixing action and puzzles across fictional worlds featuring a mix of visual styles, genres and gameplay. These worlds are the creation of gamebook author Jack Stevenson, a best-selling but embittered writer whose mysterious murder kicks off a fantastical journey across dimensions to uncover the dark secrets behind his final masterpiece.

name: One More Shot: Showdown
summary: You will randomly play as an angel/demon/god/Heretic. In this game that combines Russian roulette, strategic confrontation and identity fraud, each identity hides its own mission. You will find your hunting target through shooting and reasoning. Are you ready? One more shot!

name: Oni Fight
summary: Mahiro, who bought the new VR game “TS Fight,” decides to play with friends with a rule where the winner gets to ask the loser to do one thing…

name: OneTale
summary: UNDERTALE but you play as Niko from Oneshot!

name: Ongeki Bright Memory Act.2
summary: Update that occurred shortly after the End Chapter of Ongeki Bright Memory.

name: Ongeki Bright Memory Act.3
summary: Announced during KING of Performai the 5th, this update adds additional content, including more interactive projectile patterns.

name: Only Sliding
summary: A puzzle game with one mechanic (sliding).

name: One More Run
summary: Dive into a world that blends frenetic roguelite reverse bullet hell action with deep systems and rich customizability. Mechanical foes rally against you in an ever changing technological war. Finetune your mech from one run to the next against a threat that's constantly advancing as well.

name: On Any Journey
summary:
On Any Journey is an immersive, offline adventure built for two players, demanding tight cooperation and teamwork. With a striking blend of visual styles and inventive co-op puzzle-solving, this game isn’t just about exploring a world—it’s about experiencing a heartfelt story of friendship and self-discovery.

At its core, On Any Journey is all about the thrill of shared adventure. As Kai, Mateo, and Summer, you’ll embark on an unforgettable quest, encountering the enigmatic magician Bruno, the mysterious, mask-wearing Puka clan, and even a giant rockstar who rules the ocean depths. But no great story is complete without a formidable villain—enter "Big Man" and his relentless guards, standing in your way.

Throughout your journey, you’ll face tough choices and thrilling challenges. Confidence will battle self-doubt. Destiny will test your resolve. And when the day comes to an end, will you hold onto who you truly are, or surrender to the fate that seeks to define you?

name: Once Upon a Mind: A Little Too Friendly
summary: A story-rich psychological horror inspired by real-life experiences. Follow Emily, 23, as she moves to Brooklyn for a fresh start, but finds herself drawn into a slow spiral of obsession and control. Featuring voice acting, this atmospheric and grounded experience is deeply unsettling.

name: OneDayOne
summary: OneDayOne - visual novel where you will dive into the routine life of Sergey, from which only a miracle and...your choices can help him escape

name: One More Question
summary: A game utilizing the concept of “Situation Puzzles”, One More Question gives a new perspective on familiar quizzes, presents a backdrop and story to immerse yourself in, and give a workshop editor of your own to share your own puzzles with others. Enjoy!

name: One Paradox
summary: A first-person narrative adventure set in a dystopian future. Advance through the futuristic OF-1 factory, solve puzzles, evade other androids, and uncover its hidden secrets.

name: Only The Lost Shall See
summary: Wander though nature. Overcome dangers. Get to the end of your pilgrimage... But don't dig any deeper.

name: Only Trump: Up To Presidents!
summary: The elections are just around the corner! - will you be able to win them, overcome all the difficulties and reach the final? ONLY UP: TRUMP FOR PRESIDENT - a game in which you will feel like Donald, going through many difficult obstacles, because the basis of the game mechanics is the OnlyUp mode!

name: Onslaught
summary: This game features a highly dynamic background soundtrack, offering players an intense and thrilling challenge.

name: One Night: Young Bride for One Night
One Last Star Trip
summary: A visual novel about chasing love in university.

name: Once Upon A Puppet: Backstage Edition
summary: Contains the game and a collection of bonus goodies

name: Only Up! Cars
summary:
The higher you go, the harder it gets!
ONLY UP! CARS – The Ultimate Vertical Driving Challenge!
Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride in ONLY UP! CARS, where gravity is your greatest enemy, and the road is anything but ordinary. In this thrilling driving adventure, your goal is simple – drive higher and higher! Navigate through extreme vertical tracks, jump between platforms, and push your driving skills to the limit as you climb towards the sky.

name: Only Up 3
summary: After reaching the heights of the favelas, Jacky embarks on a spaceship that takes him straight to Grekko Island; but as soon as he arrives on this new planet he will have to start an ascent to the skies in this new ONLY UP .

name: Only Up? Climb the Tower!
summary: Challenge your limits in this 3D jumping action game! One mistake could be fatal! Climb a towering structure under maximum tension. Perform graceful jumps, master precise controls, and rely on your mental strength. Can you reach the top? Find out what awaits you up there!

name: One Man's Trash
summary: Ever heard of the guy who lost his hard drive full of PitCoins worth $1 million? You ARE that guy—now digging through a shady junkyard with a vacuum cleaner, hoping to find it. No timers. No pressure. Just you, the dirt—and whatever’s lurking in the dark.

name: Onechanbara Z2: Chaos - Black Rose
summary: Includes the costume item 'Black Rose'.

name: One-liners
summary: One-liners is a modern take on the classic dots and boxes game traditionally played with pen and paper. The goal is to create more complete boxes than your opponent by taking turns to draw horizontal or vertical lines between adjacent dots. However, there are new possibilities for strategizing and defeating your opponents, such as items that can be activated on the board.

name: Online Records: Unknown Seller
summary: A 22 year old student arranges to meet an online seller at their home to pick up an item. At first, everything seems normal, but as she steps through the door, an eerie feeling creeps in. What was supposed to be a simple purchase soon turns into an experience she will never forget.

name: One Night at the Steeze
summary:
You remember being a kid. You remember eating your first slice of pizza at the local pizzeria. You remember how the cheese would slip off the crust and onto your new jeans. You remember that one cute employee who refilled your soda a little more than the others. You remember running out of tokens for the arcade and smacking the machines when they didn't work; and you remember how one of the animatronics winked at you and proceeded to flirtatious shake its hips at you the rest of the night.

Oh you don't?

Well, on one night at the Steeze Pizzeria, something like that happened.

name: One's Own Exile
summary: One's Own Exile is a narrative exploration game in which you must abandon your identity in order to escape across the border without being noticed.

name: Ongeki Re:Fresh
summary: Ongeki Re:Fresh introduces new songs and gameplay improvements while retaining the core mechanics of joystick and button-based rhythm shooting. The update focuses on enhancing player experience with refreshed content and balancing adjustments.

name: One Hour With Mr. Hopp
summary: A spin-off of Mr. Hopp's Playhouse that was available exclusively to the Patreon supporters of Moonbit Studios.

name: Once Upon an Island
summary: You are a famous video blogger, a hunter of mystical stories, and your new project should blow up the internet. Following a fan's tip, you go to the island of Adago, lost in the ocean, where people are rumored to be missing, and the locals are talking about an ancient curse. Your goal is to make a revealing video, to prove that all this is fiction... but from the very first minutes, something goes wrong.

name: Once Up
summary: Join Cliff Hanger, the elephant with the unique ability to latch on and become weightless! Use drawings from an old fairy tale book to create your own climbing paths, conquer tricky sections, and collect peanuts to unlock new levels.

name: Ondal
summary: A colorful and chill pixel-art fishing game where you can collect hundreds of fishes.

name: Onimusha 1+2 Pack
summary:
Experience the origins of the classic samurai series remastered in high-definition! The first two Onimusha games are now available in 16:9 widescreen format with additional gameplay enhancements such as modernised controls.

Onimusha: Warlords
The first game in the series features popular actor Takeshi Kaneshiro as both the voice and face model of main character Samanosuke Akechi. Play as Samanosuke as he battles the Demons armed with the Oni Gauntlet bestowed to him by the Oni clan.

Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny
Jubei Yagyu returns in this sequel. Voiced by Yusaku Matsuda, Jubei will forge new alliances as he sets out on a quest of revenge with awakened powers of the Oni.

name: One More Experiment
summary: Control fire and water. Use elements, switches and the environment to solve puzzles in this futuristic puzzle-platformer!

name: Only Dwarves Dig Proper Holes
summary: As a Dwarf, it if your duty to dig in the search of a legendary pickaxe. Collect gems, sell and upgrade. All in glorious virtual reality. Family-friendly fun.

name: On Donuts and Holes
summary: A psychological adventure through a dreamy landscape. Face unanswerable questions to reach the ultimate enigmas: Who are you? Who am I?

name: One Last Clip
summary: You are locked inside a cinema. Your only way to escape is to follow the instructions of your task: Watch the same film clip repeatedly and search for flaws to break free. But this may sound easier than it is, every wrong decision or death will set you back. So be careful!

name: On-Together
summary: A social chatroom game to work, play games and hang out with your friends. Stay connected while you work, then use breaktimes to chat, chill, chew bubblegum and more!

name: One & Done
summary: Explore dungeons and fight monsters using four unique weapons in One & Done. Switch weapons strategically, face powerful enemies, and conquer labyrinth-like dungeons with dynamic strategies for victory!

name: One King Is Enough
summary: High-speed territory control battle! Build structures, earn money, and grow your army to expand your territory. One King Is Enough is a strategy roguelike deck-building game where you compete against players worldwide in asynchronous battles. Outsmart your rivals with your own powerful builds.

name: One Step Further
summary: I know, another climbing game that nobody asked for, but this time, you'll control a drunk bald man who wants to find his purpose in life. Climb the ''Mountain of Wishes'', always taking one step at a time.

name: Once a Pawn a King
summary: Once a Pawn a King is a roguelike, turn-based strategy game with party-building mechanics, where chess meets chaos. Venture into the ever-shifting castle of the evil White King on a quest to rescue the beloved Black King, who was recently taken by the tyrant.

name: Only Sky Parkour: Island Up!
summary: Every jump is a step closer to the top!

name: Only Up! Remaster
summary: The sky’s the limit - climb higher than ever before!

name: Onomatopeya
summary: Onomatopeya is a puzzle game where you will discover the fun side of Japanese onomatopoeia while managing a strange little shop.

name: One Day at a Time
summary: This is a short 3 level horror game made by one person.

name: One Last Journey
summary: One Last Journey is a story-driven 2D platformer set in the Veil. Play as two silent souls — Selene and Aurel — as they journey through haunting ruins, fading memories, and creeping danger in search of reunion and peace.

name: One Last Toast
summary: One Last Toast is a single player retro-inspired action horror game set in a Venetian villa. Explore the intricate interiors, solve puzzles and battle relentless zombie hordes to reach the heart of the curse trapping you in this haunted estate.

name: Only up to Space
summary: Only Up To Space is a casual yet heart-pounding climbing and platforming adventure that will test your skill, patience, and determination. As a stranded astronaut, you must ascend through a series of challenging, ever-ascending platforms to reach to the top after losing your shuttle. No wrong steps.

name: One Last Time
summary: One Last Time is a short (5-10 minutes) psychological horror game set in a school with a mysterious narrative.

name: One Hard Game Please!
summary: "One Hard Game Please" is a brutally difficult rage game inspired by The World's Hardest Game. You control a constantly moving player that bounces off walls, with the goal of reaching the finish line without touching hazards. Can you survive?"

name: One-In
summary: 4 players. One revolver. One decision.Spin, aim, and bluff your way through twisted rounds of risk and reward in this psychological multiplayer shooter.

name: OneMore
summary: Can you tell which definitions are fake and which aren't? OneMore combines traditional word-building games with rounds where you try to pick the one true definition out of four - three of them built by an AI.

name: Onigiri Run
summary: You are an onigiri that escaped from a convenience store. Dash through the city, dodging cars and obstacles on your way to freedom! A simple yet addictive high-speed onigiri running action game!

name: Once Upon a Spirit
summary: Its soul is lost! Clung to the crow! Find it! Find it in the realm of spirits!

name: Oni no Moribito
summary: A thrilling 3D action RPG set in a world of Japanese folklore, where the Oni Princess “Chiho Itsutsuno” takes center stage! you delve deep into the Nabari-no-Miya to defeat its master and stop a looming catastrophe known as Kamimadoi.

name: On the Way
summary:
In this Game you dive into a world of twisted minds as you embark on the search for a lost man.

In a classical Survival Horror Fashion in the First Person Perspective you will solve puzzles, will interact with the world and get to explore a handcrafted world! Manage your Inventory with care as you might not carry everything you collect at once. Fight off enemies with Melee and Range weapons you can find on your travels and experience the Stories of a once thriving place.

name: One Lonely Outpost + Echoes of the Plum Grove
One Rotten Oath
summary: One Rotten Oath is a story-driven FMV+FPS hybrid with horror elements. Created by the director of A Trip to Yugoslavia.

name: Once Upon a Kingdom
summary: Rebuild civilizations across storybook worlds shaped by ancient legends and myths. Once Upon A Kingdom is a card-based city builder where strategy and tower defense collide. Build your city, defend your realm, and turn the page on a new kingdom.

name: Once Upon a Katamari
summary: Keep the good times rolling with a new entry in the Katamari Damacy series! In this puzzle action-adventure game, you'll roll your Katamari through time itself. Journey through the Jurassic Period, Ice Age, historic Japan, and more eras to rebuild the starry sky.

name: Once Upon A Katamari: King of All Sounds Edition
summary:
The King of All Sounds Edition includes:
- Once Upon A KATAMARI
- Katamari Damacy Series Songs: Side A
- Katamari Damacy Series Songs: Side B

Once upon a time a katamari rolled through both past and present. In this story across time, the adage endures: Let The Good Times Roll! Now onward through new worlds to roll up thy heart's desires and to restore the stars!

name: Only Hard
summary: Only Hard is an intense platformer where every mistake costs you. Climb a mountain full of traps and obstacles, mastering timing and precision. The higher you climb, the tougher it gets. A brutal challenge, but reaching the top and tasting victory is incredibly rewarding.

name: OnlyGame
summary: A pure gameplay game, a variety of classic gameplay plus extended game configurations, you can draw custom graphics and apply them to other gameplay in the game, it is a highly expansive game.

name: One Shot
summary: One Shot is a top-down shooting game set in the Wild West. A former sheriff, burning with vengeance after his son is kidnapped, heads into an outlaw hideout to wipe them out. Arm yourself well and prepare for one-shot kills.

name: One More Mix
summary: The ultimate(?) radio show "One More Mix" has just begun! But wait—our host has zero DJ experience… is this really okay?! ∑(O_O；) Scratch with your mouse to connect beats, and join the self-proclaimed rich BAKA girl & a chill, downer gal as you witness the fate of One More Mix!

name: Only Jump On Pogo
summary: Master the pogo stick and climb ever higher through a strange, broken world. One missed jump — and you're back at the bottom. Play solo or race up with friends. Only skill will get you to the top.

name: On the Run
summary: You play as Rick Swift who has to find six flasks with chemicals on a maze-like planet infested with mutations.

name: Onigiri Shop Simulator
summary: Your own onigiri (rice ball) shop in Japan awaits! Serve perfect rice balls and crispy sides to hungry customers. As a solo operator, you'll manage inventory, perfect your cooking flow, and handle the rush. Can you turn your tiny stand into a beloved town eatery?

name: Only Dodge!
summary: "Only Dodge!" is a game inspired by The World's Hardest Game. The player remotely controls the main character with the goal of helping them escape. Players must avoid blue spheres, touch all yellow objects within each stage, and reach the green area to clear the stage.

name: Ondine: Prototype
summary: Collect souls, level your weapons, and unleash devastation in one of the most mechanically complex 2D shooters ever made.

name: One/Iro
summary: Dylan has lost everything and now wants to forget everything, help him in this little journey. One/Iro is a 3D first person puzzle game, explore the rooms to find letters and parts of the dream machine so you can discover the truth.

name: One Shot All Kill
summary: "Perfect catharsis from one calculated shot" Meticulous planning and precise execution. Utilize every element of the map to find seemingly impossible solutions, sweep away all targets with perfect trajectory, and clear this game. Your meticulous strategy is your firepower.

name: Only Up: Brainrot Together
summary: ONLY UP: BRAINROT TOGETHER is a chaotic multiplayer climbing adventure for up to 8 players. Navigate surreal levels, avoid traps, and survive encounters with bizarre brainrot creatures. Precision, timing, and teamwork are your only way up.

name: One Button Defense
summary: A fast-paced one-button defense game with endless difficulty, explosive effects, and built-in mod support. Rotate your weapon, survive the chaos, and create your own mods with JavaScript - all inside the game.

name: On Your Notebook
summary: "On Your Notebook" is a tantalizing game in which you become one of the animal paintings trapped in a corner paper and survive from the other doodles that flood in.

name: On My Way Out
summary: On My Way Out is a heartwarming adventure game about a spinning top trying to watch the sunset with his friends. The problem - the front gate won't budge. Play as Culver, who will have to spin, jump and dive through the obstacles the neighborhood contains in order to find a way out.

name: One Day of Romance
summary: Based on the traditional "Memory Flip", you need to uncover the secret of the beauty by flipping over the cards and eliminating the same cards! If the two cards have the same pattern, they will be eliminated successfully; otherwise, they will be automatically covered.

name: Onryo
summary: Onryō is a short third-person action game, created for my portfolio using pre-made assets. You play as Aiko, the daughter of a samurai, seeking revenge for a tragic past.

name: Oniria
summary: Oniria is a first-person psychological horror game with a retro aesthetic. Explore the village by solving puzzles and evading the strange presence that haunts it. Experience Angy's present in 3D, and uncover her hidden memories in 2D.

name: Only Up 2025
summary: Test your limits in Only Up 2025 — a dynamic adventure where every step, jump, and movement takes you higher and higher. This game combines spectacular vertical arcade action with realistic movement simulation, delivering a unique climbing experience.

name: One-Hit Slayer! Swordog
summary: Decide the battle with a single deadly strike! If you take a hit, both you and your enemy will fall in one blow— a simple yet challenging high-difficulty action game. Within a limited 10-second window, read your opponent's movements, find an opening, and strike them down instantly!

name: Onirical
summary: Aid Wimsy and its critters into the Oniric space to purify each world from the darkness!

name: OnlyRun
summary: A walking sim with a lot of jumping

name: One Night In 2D
summary: As a night guard, you need to defend against Freddy Flatbear and his evil animatronic crew! But instead of surviving in a 3D world, you need to master the constraints of 2D to make it through the night. Will you make it, or will Flatbear end your night early?

name: One in the Back
summary: An escape-room styled series of puzzles await in the car that seems to contain neither rhyme nor reason. See if you can solve the mysteries of the photographs, and figure out what it means to be the One in the Back.

name: Onefold Taxi Simulator
summary: It has a lot of possibilities for all players. Taxi driving is a hobby or a professional level. You can transport for a time or even without a time limit. If you want your own company, just buy some cars, hire employees and become the best taxi entrepreneur in town!

name: Only Whores Survive
summary: Survive a wild zombie apocalypse, rescue gorgeous girls, and build your own harem in this adult-only action game. Loot, shoot, and enjoy steamy rewards while fighting off the undead. Only the hottest survive.

name: One Pass
summary: "One Pass": A Stress-Reliever,a New Leisure Favorite!Control adorable little characters,collect gold coins, and navigate through fantasy levels.But don't underestimate the challenges, as each level hides the author's "little pranks" full of traps and humorous moments.Are you ready? Let's get started

name: Only Go Up 2
summary: Climb higher than ever before. One wrong move and it’s all over. Every jump counts.

name: ONAF: Algebra Asylum
summary: You're trapped for just under a week with the Algebraliens- strange, otherwordly and walking-talking numbers and symbols. How long can you survive before your heart can't take it anymore?

name: One Shot Arena
summary: One Shot Arena is a multiplayer game of precision and perfect timing, where quick reflexes and sharp strategy make all the difference. Are you ready to outsmart and outplay your rivals?

name: One Potion Please
summary: NSFW expansion themed potion crafting puzzle game! Mix kink-themed potions to inflate boobs, bwomph butts, and more, in this comedic and lewd fantasy world.

name: Only Down: Gravitation Up
summary: Only Down: Gravitation Up — descend through the centuries without letting gravity and fans knock you off course! Evolve and conquer levels in Only Down: Gravitation Up.

name: One Giant Hole
summary: One Giant Hole is a multiplayer voxel-mining game where players collectively dig an enormous hole through online collaboration. Players contribute to the excavation either alone or with others, communicating through a social media-style chat system, while working together to discover what lies at the bottom of their shared excavation project.

name: Onto Maizilind Unto Infinity
summary: OMUI is a first-person narrative horror game set in an alternate reality 1970s Iran. A playful childhood afternoon in Tehran descends into the trauma of the Iranian Revolution, transforms into a nuclear apocalypse, and concludes with the suicide of my Uncle Ramin.

name: One Nation Under the Old Gods
summary: A Rogue-lite Deckbuilder set in early 1800s United States. Play as members of a secret organization that investigates occult activity in an effort to stop various cults from summoning Eldritch Gods. Acquire cards to create combos and synergies to defeat your enemies in turn-based combat!

name: Once Before Us
summary: A cooperative, narrative puzzle adventure for two players. Explore a mysterious world, solve interconnected challenges, and communicate to progress. Once Before Us is a game about thinking, perception, and discovery through exploration and problem-solving.

name: Only Animals
summary: Venture into an endless world of shifting biomes and living ecosystems. Capture and transform into 100+ animals to explore, fight, and survive. Brave nights, battle colossal bosses, collect mystical hats, and team with up to 9 friends in a wilderness that never stops growing!

name: One More Gem
summary: "One more gem" is a love letter for all the classic retro games similar to Supaplex or Rocks'n'Diamonds. Featuring more game elements, modern graphics and 130 levels packed with thrilling monsters and mind bending puzzles. If you want one more gem, the game also features a level editor.

name: One With the Unicycleverse
summary: A precision platformer where you maneuver and weave your unicycle through hundreds of dastardly obstacles across dozens of levels and side modes. Upon mastering the controls; the game becomes a meditative experience and you will discover what it means to be ‘One with the Unicycleverse.’

name: One Halloween Night
summary:
- One Halloween Night is a realistic home-invasion horror experience created using the Unity Engine. This is definitely my best project yet, and I appreciate every download!

-You take the position of a teenage boy, who is left home alone on Halloween night. Your parents had to unexpectedly leave the house for the night, with you left to manage trick-or-treaters. What should have been a simple, smooth, and relaxing night, quickly turns into a terrifying Nightmare.

- Full gameplay takes about 25 minutes.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Character Pack 7
One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Character Pack 8 Special Selection
Once Upon a Katamari: Katamari Damacy Series Songs - Side B
summary: This pack contains 34 additional BGM tracks and 8 costume pieces from previous Katamari series titles.

name: Once Upon a Katamari: Katamari Damacy Series Songs - Sides A + B Bundle
summary: This bundle includes 60 additional BGM tracks and 26 Costume pieces from previous Katamari series titles. Jam along to all your favorite music from Katamari Forever, Beautiful Katamari, Touch My Katamari, and more! *Additional BGM available after completing certain missions.

name: Once Upon a Katamari: Katamari Damacy Series Songs - Side A
summary: This pack contains 26 additional BGM tracks and 18 costume pieces from previous Katamari series titles.

name: One Night of Romance With My Waifu
summary: "Deep in the stillness of the night, the wind drums against the bamboos. Who will pity my lonely figure, facing the empty bed?" Sir, this lonely beauty is eagerly awaiting you, her delicate body craving your comfort.

name: Once Upon a Child - Full Stop
summary: A cute and short visual novel about the power of words

name: One
summary: An upcoming port release from QUByte Interactive for modern platforms.

name: Once Upon a Time
summary: Step into the shoes of Jaś, an ordinary boy who suddenly finds himself in a magical land filled with Polish legends and myths. The power over this world has fallen into the hands of the sinister Master Twardowski, and the land is sinking into chaos.

name: Once Upon a Katamari: Katamari Damacy Series Dance Dance Remixes
summary:
Includes:
- 5 dazzling remixes featuring songs from the collaborative EP "Denonbu Katamarespect" by DENONBU
- 10 costume pieces from previous Katamari series titles

name: Once Upon a Katamari: Katamari Damacy Series Neo Remixes
One Million Buttons
summary: There are one million buttons. Only one button is correct. The correct button is chosen randomly, and there are no hints. Good luck!

name: One More 6ix
summary: A short-session clicker where you roll dice, chase streaks, and fight the cruelty of RNG in a minimalist, dopamine-driven challenge. Are you lucky enough though?

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Legendary Edition
Only Down: Into the Abyss
summary: Only Down: Into the Abyss is an original parkour game, since one of the main mechanics of the game is to descend through the world, crossing time periods and the traps and puzzles that make it up.

name: One by One
summary: A cooperative VR horror adventure where you explore haunted mansions as a child, outsmart unique monsters, solve puzzles, and uncover treasures in a spooky, story-rich world.

name: Oneirium
summary: Awaken to a realm where dreams and reality blur beyond recognition. As the Awakened One, you must traverse a haunting world of nightmares and fragmented memories, where nothing is certain and every shadow hides unspeakable truths. Traverse the Dream revealing the nature of existence itself.

name: Onna Sennyuu Sousakan no Hentai Chiiku: Shoufu no You ni Midareru Yakumo
summary: Undercover agent Yakumo’s mission takes a dark turn when the organization she’s infiltrating already knows who she is. Captured and subjected to brutal “training,” she must endure, adapt, and survive — or risk losing herself completely as they twist her into their perfect double agent.

name: Ontos
summary: A sci-fi mystery set on the repurposed moon hotel Samsara. Uncover cryptic experiments, face unsettling encounters, and piece together a mind-bending narrative. The deeper you go, the more the truth unravels as you confront the ultimate question: What is reality?

name: Once Glorious Artahk
summary: Explore the ruins of an ancient city. Solve puzzles to unlock new paths, abilities, and forgotten lore. Read the lost stories you uncover to gain insight into a tangled web of mysteries. Using only your wits and your trusty torch to guide you, you must find a way to return light to a starless sky.

name: Once Upon a Shell
summary: Once Upon a Shell is a roguelike racing game of ridiculous speed and wild upgrades. As a tortoise, use your shell to your advantage and slide downhill to generate speed. Build movement combos between races and prove that even a tortoise can lift The Hare Cup.

name: One Summer Holiday
summary: Immerse yourself in a nostalgic summer vacation of rural comfort. A timeless place of natural beauty, rich conversations, quiet occurrences and indulgent detail and delight awaits you in One Summer Holiday.

name: On Tape << Rewind
summary: On Tape << Rewind is a psychological horror story told through cassette tapes. Play recordings, search for clues, discover hidden cassettes, and manipulate audio. Unravel the mystery of a scientist’s disappearance and the obsession that consumed him — tape by tape.

name: Only Down: Not Up!
summary: After finishing his shift, a crane operator finds himself stuck at the top of a massive crane tower. There’s no climbing up, only down! Jump from platform to platform, avoid falling, and reach the ground to get home. Only Down: Not Up!

name: One More Spin
summary: An incremental slot machine clicker. Every click is a chance to win big, so don't stop! Go for one more spin.

name: Onion House
summary: It is a semi-real-time adventure game developed in 1983. It was released by MIA under the title “ONION HOUSE”, although it was originally known during development as “Circumference.” The game features a distinctive system that combines the command-based adventure game format popular at the time with real-time action elements. It is characterized by a high level of difficulty and complex puzzles, and has been regarded as a title that divided opinions since its release. The game was distributed on cassette tape. Its original retail price was 980 yen. The supported platform is the PC-6001.

name: Only Up: Parkour Game
summary: Climb higher, move faster, and never stop until you reach the peak.

name: One Last Sacrifice
summary: PvP Autobattler meets character progression. Draft your board from a rotating shop. Build a semi-persistent deck and refine it through crafting. Discover powerful synergies. Outwit your opponents in sync or async duels and ascend the Arenas of Naskarr. A card battler without pay-to-win mechanics.

name: Onigashima
summary: Onigashima is a psychological horror visual novel with romantic tragedy, supernatural loop mechanics, and dual-layered narration. Play as a nameable protagonist and uncover the truth behind the Red Moon and the devouring of your villagers.

name: One Button Dungeon
summary: A minimalist dungeon crawler built entirely around a single input.

name: One Iced Latte: Milk Song
summary:
One Iced Latte: Milk Song is a visual novel with elements of management and a dating simulator.

This is a story-driven indie video game made by two people inspired by romantic comedy anime.

name: On Titan
summary: There are banana people living on Titan. They regularly hold tennis tournaments without rules for the Saturn Cup. They invite foreign players from all over the universe. Fans have also arrived from planet Earth and are waiting for you as a Player. Dress up in a banana uniform and try it out..

name: One Last Ride
summary: In One Last Ride, you’re killing time at a quiet stop. Three minutes of waiting reveal far more than you expected. For Taking One Last Ride.
